story:
Short summary

My name is Joe Cawley. I live in the hills of Tenerife (Canary Islands) with my family and other wildlife. The goats are no relation... despite rumours to the contrary.

I'm a freelance travel writer and my work has appeared in many publications including The Sunday Times, Conde Nast Traveller, New York Post and Taipei Times.

My first book, More Ketchup than Salsa, was a humorous portrayal of moving overseas in the hope that the grass turns out to be greener. By the way, it wasn't, it was just mowed differently. The book was voted 'Best Travel Narrative' by the British Guild of Travel Writers and hit the #1 spot in Travel and in Humour in the UK.

This Indiegogo campaign is about funding Even More Ketchup than Salsa, the  sequel that carries on from where the first Ketchup left off, and is not just about writing the book, it's about proving that traditionally published authors don't need the old school publishing system anymore and that it's possible to go indie and do it yourself.

I hope you can help me put one over on 'the old school'!

Where the money will go

To publish Even More Ketchup than Salsa as a solo venture, I'll need around $6,500, the bulk of which will be used in professional editing, graphic design for the cover, marketing, postage and a print run.

What you get

In return for contributing to this project, there are various perks on offer, depending on the level of funding. At the least you will get an early version e-book, gifted and sent with a personal message from me to you plus a personal thanks via twitter. Or a signed paperback if you up the ante slightly. You can also get your name printed on a special 'Thanks to you' page in the book; or at the front of the book as one of my select 'Book Angels'. One person can even get a part in the story after I've spoken to you and found out a little bit more about you.

The impact

Your contribution will not only just help me achieve my goal, but will also blaze a trail for many other frustrated writers (perhaps you) who have previously had the door slammed in their face by traditional publishers. You will be part of this indie revolution that has already stormed the embassy of the music empire is now rattling the gates of the publishing world. So if you can, join the revolution now!

Other ways you can help

Even if you're not in a position to contribute financially to this campaign, it would help immensely if you could help spread the word. Share the link to this page on Facebook and Twitter. Post it on your blog. Email friends. Get them all to join the e-revolution and make successful publishing more accessible to indie writers.

There are tools at the bottom of this Indiegogo page to help make that easy.

story:
HELP MORE KIDS BECOME GOOD READERS!

Introduction

Hello! I’m Jean Ciborowski Fahey, PhD.

        I’m raising money to self-publish a unique book called ...

 

Make Way for Reading - 

a story guide for parents of babies and young children

 

 

This book is in response 

to the alarmingly high number of our children

who are not learning to read !!!

Why do I know this? I know this because for 4 decades I watched more and more children arrive at school unprepared to learn to read, fall behind and rarely catch up.

I taught graduate school at Lesley University and spent 15 years at a Harvard teaching hospital assessing and learning from young children with reading difficulties. Working with Boston Center for Homeless Families, I also saw, close up, how poverty hijacks the reading development of even the brightest of children. 

Parents Make the Difference. Guided by exciting research in early brain development, we now know that when parents learn simple yet fun things to do in their children's first 5 years of life, children arrive at school much better prepared to learn to read and succeed. Thus, I began to deliver early literacy seminars to parents-to-be at a community hospital.   

In my current position as an Early Literacy Research Specialist, I work with a nonprofit that promotes early literacy in thousands of pediatric exam rooms. Serving more than 4 million children across the US, mostly low-income and poor, 28,000 pediatric medical providers advise parents about the importance of reading aloud in the first 5 years of their childrens' lives and distribute almost 7 million free books a year to babies and young children!

What’s This Unique Book About?

Make Way for Reading brings science and story together in a carefully crafted rhymed picture book. 

It’s about how one little girl gets ready for a lifelong adventure of reading. The story follows Eva from infancy to first grade as she learns to read with the important people in her life (including the family dog!)  

What Does the Book Look Like?

           

As you open the book, the right page tells the story of a child as she learns to read.

On the left page is a message about what children need from us to get ready to learn to read.

Who Is This Book For?

The book is designed to inspire, teach and entertain grandparents, aunts, uncles, nannies, teachers and any fan of a young child- age birth to five.

But it is especially written for parents ...

  • Parents-to-be
  • Busy parents
  • Immigrant parents
  • Parents who love to read
  • Parents who rarely read
  • Parents who do not read

And because it's in rhyme, it's also a wonderful story to read aloud to a toddler, preschooler and kindergartener on the verge of reading!

Why is This Book Needed?

This book is a wake up call to parents.

More than half of America’s 4th graders are behind in reading, and many of these children never catch up!

During my 15 years assessing hundreds of poor readers, I learned the neuroscience that pointed to this exciting finding:

Face time with parents — especially in a child’s first 5 years — is extremely important for building the neural pathways in the brain for learning to read.

The science is clear. Even the tiniest of babies are programmed to listen and look for their parents' voices and faces. And when parents put down their cell phones or computers and respond with intention (i.e., eye contact, smiles, talking, reading, word play), the young brain forms crucial connections for learning to read.  

Now, encouraged by so many of you, I created a story as a way to educate parents and others about all they can do to get our little ones ready to read and succeed.

Is there a demand for this book?

The text has been field-tested. As a national speaker on early literacy, I haven taken this story on the road. In my capacity as a university professor and early literacy research specialist, I speak at many conferences, such as the International Reading Association, National Association for the Education of Young Children, National Center for Family Literacy, National Conference on Homeless Families and National Association for Family Child Care. I also address Rotaries, libraries, high schools, literacy events, adult basic education classes, and companies with employees who are also parents/grandparents of babies and young children. 

There is a demand for this book. At these gatherings, I present a slide show of the story. Volunteers in the room take turns reading each page aloud. By the end of the 13-page story, the audience invariably expresses a collective “a-ha!” as they grasp the difference parents and others can make. Requests for the book – from parents, early educators, caregivers and even policy makers – have been so numerous, I decided to self-publish. 

What’s the Status of this project?

I’ve already begun prototyping the book. I have taken the initial steps to produce this book. Two talented professionals – an accomplished children's book illustrator Peter Thornton - (Everybody Cooks Rice series, Carol Rhoda Books); and a wonderful book designer, Elizabeth Dipalma– are working together and have produced sample spreads that can be seen in the video. 

The Grand Plan

With your investments, my trusted team and the beautifully illustrated published book in hand,

  • I will be looking for a socially conscious corporate sponsor to buy the book and pay for subsequent printing costs.

  • In this way, I will be able to distribute the book free of charge to programs that work with families of young children.

  • Parent educators and early education teachers may be happy to know my intention to produce a CD of the book (for large group literacy events) and to translate the parent messages into Spanish and other languages.

 

What I’m Looking For and What You Get in Return

I’m raising $15,000 to cover illustration, book design, printing, promotion and shipping costs. Everything you pledge will go toward these costs as well as Indiegogo fees.

Illustration and book design costs              $5,000

Printing (limited 1st edition)                        $3,000

Promotion, legal, tee shirt, shipping costs    $7,000

If I raise additional funds ...

I will create a CD of the book ASAP so parent educators can use it with groups of parents at literacy events; and

teachers can use it with groups of pre-K children and their parents.

Extra funds will also help me create a version of the book in Spanish and other languages.

As a $25 investor, you will receive a signed, 1st edition copy of the book delivered to your doorstep in early 2013. If you invest more, you can receive ...

  • for the little reader in your life and/or neighborhood both a book and a T-shirt with book art or;
  • a donation in your name of 15 of my books to your favorite program or;
  • an author event.

 

If You’d Like to Invest … What’s the Next Step?

 Select the Perk in the right column that is best for you. You'll have a choice to pay using Pay Pal or your credit card.

Other Places You Can Learn About Me And My Campaign

MY FILM:   http://www.getreadytoread.org/early-learning-ch...

MY BLOG:  http://www.Journeytowardliteracy.wordpress.com

FACEBOOK:  http://facebook.com/faheyjean

PRINT MEDIA:

http://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1080/0009...

 

 

ONE THOUSAND THANK YOUS!!  for your support. 

If you are unable to invest, that's O.K.!

You can support the project by spreading the word to others. Don’t forget to give them the link to the project.

www.Indiegogo.com  Then search for:

Make-Way-for-Reading 

Most gratefully yours, Jean

story:
Who Am I And What Is This?

My name is Donald aka Scott Roche and I am a blogger, podcaster, author, and editor for Flying Island Press. I've been a fan of Westerns all of my life and have always wanted to write one. Thanks to Jared Axelrod, I got an idea for setting and a brace of characters a few years ago and began writing a story. As occasionally happens, I put the story away to let it simmer.  

This year I took it out of the drawer and started working on a novella. After sending it around to some friends, I decided to open up the universe to a select few authors and see what they would do with it. Imagine the gunslingers of the old west with an honor code similar to a samurai’s Bushido, the way of the warrior. These Martials and Rangers, along with the followers of the Clockworker - fabulous tinkerers and healers - are in conflict with an increasingly corrupt justice system lead by the Judges.

The short stories in this anthology will have all of the action and adventure that you’d expect from a Sunday matinee shoot’em up with a dash of philosophy and tension as ancient codes deal with an increasingly modern world. 

In addition to my own story, this anthology will contain works by some of my favorite authors. Jake Bible, the mind behind Dead Mech and The AmericansJustin Macumber, author of the military sci fi novel Haywire, Zach Ricks, editor of Flagship magazine and author of his own Weird Western series,Jared Axelrod, creator of the rich world behind Fables of the Flying City andDoc Coleman podcaster and author of the steampunk series Crackle and Bang

Thanks for having a look at this project and share it with all of your friends!

STRETCH GOAL!!!!

If we can hit $2750 a story from none other than Alasdair Stuart will be added to the anthology. I want this. I want this some kind of bad. LET'S MAKE THIS HAPPEN!!

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

 There are several risks and challenges in this project. I have to rely on the artist and authors to supply their works. I then have to take those works and compile them into a book. It's a lot of work. Thankfully my years of work as a self publisher, as well as my work for Flying Island Press have provided me the skills I need. Add to that the fact that I have worked with all of the people associated with this project and have ultimate confidence in their ability to meet deadlines.

What's the money for?

Each author will be paid a semi professional rate ($.025/word). I have also allotted money for an editor and an artist. IndieGoGo gets a piece, and there are taxes. I also have money earmarked for "miscellaneous" which will go towards fulfilling rewards and other expenses.

story:
My project is the creation and distribution of a print format for my books. The Alex Tanner Saga begins with a prequel novella, named Beyond the Shadows, set ten years before my first novel: Demonic Designs.  I would like to see them both in print eventually, but Beyond the Shadows will be my starting point.  It's short, just over sixty pages on 8 1/2" X 11".  And that probably translates to about double in a paperback format.  I can get it into an electronic format without a problem, but I'm hoping to also put it into people's hands even if they don't have the means or desire to read it electronically. My goal is at least 1,000 printed copies.

I haven't sent this story to a major publishing firm yet because I'd like to believe that, with just a small push, my story has the ability to support itself. My goal is simply to bypass the conglomerate book publishing companies and put into print a book I am proud of. Once people get a taste of the story, have a chance to fall in love with the characters, and become entangled in the plot, I have faith that my audience will continue to grow. My audience is, and always has been, my inspiration. As such, I leave it up to you to support and give my work merit.

The risks and challenges that come with completing a project of this type revolve around the continued distribution of the product.  I'm confident in my ability to come up with fresh storyline, but I'm going to need support to get and keep this project going so that I can continue to put a physical copy in the hands of fans who don't own an e-reader or just don't like them.

Additionally, self-publishing doesn't have the bells and whistles that big brand companies can give it. So I turn to the people who will give me honest feedback and support. Truthfully, you are the only ones who matter.

The proceeds from this campaign are, naturally, unpredictable.  Consequently, I'll have to look into different publishing companies for quality and quantity (as well as methods of distribution), but I'm committed to telling this story, with which I am so obsessed, to as many people as possible.  So, keep an eye out!

story:
The Mavrican Taint

Book one of Tools of Destruction

First Novel from Australian author Conor Robinson

What began as a more productive way to spend my free time instead of video games soon became a passion which produced a fully fleshed out book, more to my own surprise than anyone else! The book itself is complete, I have the eBook editions up and running on a number of platforms and now I need a bit of a hand getting the physical prints finished and getting the word out. If you'd like to read a sample of the book (about 15%) please visit http://www.smashwords.com/books/view/210519 before you go further. If you're curious and love epic fantasy novel's then read on!

 

Synopsis

Life at the Institute hadn't been so bad for Douglas. Sure he was a mental patient who spent every night waking from a nightmare about the end of the world, finding his hands coated in blood that couldn't be explained. Still the food was edible, the wardens only mildly hostile and he'd managed to make some friends.


Then there was the attempt on his life and everything changed.


He discovered he is the last Askardian, one of those who can 'craft' the elements without sponsorship from a higher deity. It didn't help that the new teachers of his flourishing powers happen to be inside his own head, redefining the term sanity.

Now he's being sent out into the coastal city of Sol Mavrica where the citizens live with an accepted curse, where a killer stalks the shadows slaying the unwary, where both the local Tribunal forces and a fermenting rebellion seek to recruit him for his powers and to top it all off he has to go to school if he wants to eat, a school buried deep underneath the city where dark things steal wayward students who aren't on time.

 

Why Indiegogo

Honestly, I'm here for two reasons. The first is that like many others I'm addicted to this crowd funding stuff. Secondly while the funding I'll raise here will be essential it's also a marketing tool in itself, one I've seen employed with remarkable success by others.

Of the money in question the first 200 will go towards the first print run, allowing me to distribute the book. The next 300 will go towards organizing a professional cover design for my upcoming book Method to the Madness to be realeased late October and the final 500 shall be fed into advertising and promotions!

Which is why the $3 tier is essential. Almost half off the retail price you can grab the book here and enjoy 'The Mavrican Taint' on your platform of choice with a DRM-free copy of the book. So grab a cheap copy of the book here, give it a read and if you're feeling warm, fuzzy and generous rate it on Amazon or Smashwords and leave a review.

 

Not just another fantasy book.

Inside you will find no vampires, werewolves, orcs or goblins. You'll find a new system of magic (crafting) based on biology which also ties into the very fabric that binds this world together. You'll find strange new people and creatures that all have their place in this realm. You'll find an entire new world I'm building that I hope you will enjoy learning about as much as I enjoyed creating it.

This is a book where everything matters. Its one of those books you'll read for the first time and while enjoying it will likely miss a dozen subtle details, details you'll delight in picking up after the second read through because of its complexity.

 

Spreading the word

If you're not content to just throw money at your screen or just want to help out without pledging then pass the word along. If you have a friend who adores fantasy with a twist then inform him/her/it and point them here or share this on your social network of choice.

If you're a part of any online book group or forums and don't mind earning my eternal gratitude then tell your colleagues about the novel. If you're not interested in posting about the book but know of forums, review sites or book groups that I should be hitting up that I might have missed then comment here or drop us an email at info@conor-robinson.com. Your email could be filled with something like: 'You fool! Send this delicious travesty to www.insert-relevant-website-here.com so it can be JUDGED by the unwashed yet curious masses.'

 

Rewards & Disclaimer

Many might be wondering how I can insert so many people into the series with the rewards. Understand that I have the entire framework for the series already set out (Storyboarding!) So I know what needs to happen and when it should happen. However that leaves me with the 'how' it will happen, the most important element. As I'm writing the second book 'A Storms Bluff' I've found much of the hows are writing themselves, yet allowing me to fold them into relevant story points. Therefore the framework I have is flexible and always up for a challenge.

For those who are interested in the higher pledge tiers which include involvement in the book, I will point out I do not relinquish any of my copyright or creative licence by involving you. You send me your details and I'll throw you a list of potential characters you can be, including possible back story and an idea of what part you'll play in the book. I'll do my best to work with you but in the end it's still my book, if you're asking to become a god that kills the main character and makes off with all the ladies then I'll have to politely decline. Also note that during the course of your duties for fictional entertainment there is a distinct possibility your character might die. For minor characters if your character develops well then there is a chance he, she or it will turn up again in later books but I make no promises.

In the books 'special thanks' section you'll also be placed under the category Cast, ensuring bragging rights.

 

Thankyou for Reading

Whether you pledged or not thanks for reading! You can check out my website at www.conor-robinson.com or find me on facebook via the links here to get updates about my other upcoming titles.

The Mavrican Taint
Book one of Tools of Destruction
First Novel from Australian author Conor Robinson
What began as a more productive way to spend my free time instead of video games soon became a passion which produced a fully fleshed out book, more to my own surprise than anyone else! The book itself is complete, I have the eBook editions up and running on a number of platforms and now I need a bit of a hand getting the physical prints finished and getting the word out. If you'd like to read a sample of the book (about 15%) please visit http://www.smashwords.com/books/view/210519 before you go further. If you're curious and love epic fantasy novel's then read on!
 
Synopsis
Life at the Institute hadn't been so bad for Douglas. Sure he was a mental patient who spent every night waking from a nightmare about the end of the world, finding his hands coated in blood that couldn't be explained. Still the food was edible, the wardens only mildly hostile and he'd managed to make some friends.
 Then there was the attempt on his life and everything changed.
 He discovered he is the last Askardian, one of those who can 'craft' the elements without sponsorship from a higher deity. It didn't help that the new teachers of his flourishing powers happen to be inside his own head, redefining the term sanity. Now he's being sent out into the coastal city of Sol Mavrica where the citizens live with an accepted curse, where a killer stalks the shadows slaying the unwary, where both the local Tribunal forces and a fermenting rebellion seek to recruit him for his powers and to top it all off he has to go to school if he wants to eat, a school buried deep underneath the city where dark things steal wayward students who aren't on time.
 
Why Indiegogo
Honestly, I'm here for two reasons. The first is that like many others I'm addicted to this crowd funding stuff. Secondly while the funding I'll raise here will be essential it's also a marketing tool in itself, one I've seen employed with remarkable success by others.Of the money in question the first 200 will go towards the first print run, allowing me to distribute the book. The next 300 will go towards organizing a professional cover design for my upcoming book Method to the Madness to be realeased late October and the final 500 shall be fed into advertising and promotions!
Which is why the $3 tier is essential. Almost half off the retail price you can grab the book here and enjoy 'The Mavrican Taint' on your platform of choice with a DRM-free copy of the book. So grab a cheap copy of the book here, give it a read and if you're feeling warm, fuzzy and generous rate it on Amazon or Smashwords and leave a review.
 
Not just another fantasy book.
Inside you will find no vampires, werewolves, orcs or goblins. You'll find a new system of magic (crafting) based on biology which also ties into the very fabric that binds this world together. You'll find strange new people and creatures that all have their place in this realm. You'll find an entire new world I'm building that I hope you will enjoy learning about as much as I enjoyed creating it.

story:
Welcome to the campaign for MY LOVE ELECTRIC, an offbeat, coming-of-age, romance novel that I've been working on for several years and need your help to bring into fruition! 


Who am I? 

I'm J. X. Carrera,  writer and filmmaker based in New York and New Jersey.

I've directed and produced hundreds of videos for clients ranging from financial publications and tech startups, to entertainment news outlets and the fashion industry. Here is my website, and here I am on a Japanese TV show, as the guest director in the making of an AKB48 music video:


What is the novel about?

Here's the synopsis...

Filming unsuspecting pedestrians from a bedroom window. Piloting an Earth-sized robot through the Milky Way. Flying with Golden Age comic book heroes. Communing with God the Mother.

Welcome to the life of Elsa, a young, dorky daydreamer and videophile who sleeps fifteen hours a day and spends every night teetering closer to a nervous breakdown, woefully wondering why her lover and only friend, the gorgeously-green-eyed Tomoko, left her. What went wrong with Elsa’s life-plan? Will she ever achieve her dream of becoming a famous film director? Or an international pop star? Or a spiritual messiah? Er, well, whichever comes first?

Out of options, Elsa decides on an extreme measure: she locks herself in her pitch black apartment and vows to embrace a life of utter isolation until she has transformed herself into the ideal human. And with her secret weapon, the sexy desktop computer she’s affectionately nicknamed “Shahrazade,” she’ll never have to shower, hide her acne, or rely on flimsy human affection again! But when a mysterious (cute?) man she meets online unexpectedly mails her a strange gift, Elsa's reclusive existence is shattered and she's forced to embark upon a romantic, metaphysical journey through the darkest recesses of the internet to unlock the truth about sex, love, and the universe.

Click here for the first chapter

What will the funding help with?

To successfully publish the novel in a timely fashion! This could include and may not be limited to copy editing, formatting, designing cover art or interior art, creating e-book files, recording an audio version, building a website for promotion, and all the etceteras. I will be submitting to agents aggressively, and in the case that a publisher foots the bill for any of these services, the remaining money will still be needed for marketing. 

Share this with one friend!

Indiegogo has some great share tools that you can use. If you could pass this along and convince just one person in your network of friends to contribute along with you, that alone would ensure that this campaign is a success!

*A note regarding perks

For clarification, all perks should be interpreted as my thank you gifts for your donations, and not the purchase of goods and services from me.

story:
Help me publish my first novel. It is fact-based fiction written for grades 4-12.

“Grandma’s Secret” is the story of an Army brat named Madeline who’s trying to find out her grandma’s secret. When her family is stationed in Germany, Madeline’s search reveals a link to the past that that no one wants to talk about.

The author is a retired teacher, history buff and Army Brat. As a teen, he lived in Germany in the late 70s and then returned to teach on an American Army base some 30 years later.

The purpose of this campaign is to raise the funds necessary to independently publish the book.  Money raised will be used primarily to publish and get the word out. Some contributions will be used for the tools to finish the book. The plan is to run this campaign through June 2012 with a publish copy “off the presses” by August 1st.

The Impact

Even if this campaign doesn't reach its goal, you will still be able to get this book. This campaign is about me finishing this book, and getting a solid first print run out there. 

After the campaign finishes, the book will be released via Amazon, Internet sites and my own site in multiple formats for maximum enjoyment. Full disclosure: Even if the campaign doesn't succeed, everyone who donates will get what they paid for. So this isn't something that can fail. 

See excepts below.

What We Need & What You Get

The contributions will be used for the following:

  • ~$600 for 50 print copies for distribution
  • ~$200 for bookmarks and other advertisement
  • ~$200 for help editing a final version.
  • ~$120 for IndieGoGo Fees

AND ALL CONTRIBUTORS WILL GET COPY OF BOOK. (see perks)

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

This is a social media generated, DIY project – and we need your help to realize its potential. Here’s how you can make a difference:

  • CONTRIBUTE to our campaign! Any amount appreciated.
  • SHARE our project with anyone who might be interested – by word of mouth, via email, on Facebook, Twitter, etc. Tell your friends. Tell your family. Tell your enemies. Tell your hairdresser or the cashier when buying groceries.
  • LEARN MORE about the book by visiting www.worrell.us/secret
  • WRITE about the book and campaign on your blog, newspaper, magazine, etc.

 Excerpt from Chapter 8

The first stop on our tour is an iron gate with "Arbeit Macht Frei" at the top. Molly translates it as "Freedom Through Work." Just inside hang two plaques in remembrance of the 1945 liberation by American forces. We walk through the office that once served as the administration office and assorted workshops. On the walls hang timelines and information in many languages. It reminds me how the horrors of Dachau affected the entire world.

We entered into the Shunt Room and the showers. I can feel the pain and loss of dignity that took place in these adjacent buildings. Tables are set up dividing the room into two. On the one side stood the newly arrived prisoners forced to surrender all of their clothing and possessions. On the other side are the tables where the SS brutally processed each prisoner. Like the prisoners, we enter a room where several shower heads hang on the ceiling. It is in this room the naked prisoner heads were shaved; they were deloused and then showered before being marched to the courtyard and eventually the barracks. As we leave the Bath, I ask Dad in a whisper why there are hooks hanging from ceiling. I feel sick to learn that the shower room was also used to hang prisoners.

story:
Story of My Book

From In Power to Empower: Finding Your Unique Leadership Proposition an entrepreneurial approach to leadership, giving readers the tools to see previous versions of their leadership styles as iterations with opportunities for self-improvement. The problem with leadership today is that confidence is being misconstrued with competence; this book explores finding an effective balance between the two.

My name is Afroze Ali and I am the author of From In Power to Empower: Finding Your Unique Leadership Proposition. I wrote this book because I had to shake all of the limitations that others had put on me as a leader and take an entrepreneurial approach to define what kind of leader I wanted to be. I want to share my learnings with other aspiring leaders.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that the simple act of questioning whether or not you are competent enough to be a leader is exactly what will make you a good leader. Of course that modesty paired with enough confidence to garner confidence from those you lead would make the ideal combination. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for believing in yourself the way you are in you. And then ultimately I want you to see this book as a tool to help you embrace mistakes and failures as a part of your success. Mistakes are the beginning of all that is great and are a sign of what is to come from empowering others to do the same.

In this book, you'll learn about good leadership, bad leadership and how to distinguish between the two for yourself, your team or organization:

  • Lessons learned from an executive at IBM: Current leaders have wisdom that should be leaned on so we don’t have to reinvent the wheel; at a minimum we can identify the source of the macro-level problems with leadership.
  • Reflections from a Mexican healthcare entrepreneur: Leadership has different levels of maturity. We all look up to our parents and loved ones who’ve been there and learned that; however, we must redefine how we choose to lead and potentially even reject how our parents led during a different point in time.
  • Leaders as Cultural Champions: A long-time Apple employee in a managerial role shares her feelings about how much culture is impacted when a leader leaves an organization. Culture cannot simply be a policy or interview question; every person in the company is responsible for creating, recreating and maintaining a successful company culture.
  • What are leaders supposed to be doing anyway? Expert, PhD in Organizational Leadership sums it up nicely through when he shared his first lessons in leadership as a boy scout. Additionally, Afroze’s current manager and VP at SMITH shares how she not only finds the right people to be leaders but how she empowers them.
  • Dispelling Myths about Leadership in Tech: One of my friends and colleagues who is a CTO at an enterprise-level foodservice technology company shares his thoughts and approaches to leadership.

 

You will love this book if you...

  • are aching to find what makes you unique and marketable, but can’t seem to do enough of the right things to feel successful
  • are currently in a managerial role but have trouble leading, or wish to move up in your organization
  • are curious to take an entrepreneurial look at your own leadership style
  • have often felt yourself to be a misfit when really you never fit in because you were meant to lead

 

From In Power to Empower is a non-fiction book that speaks to professionals early in their careers and experienced professionals who are looking at trying to define what they stand for and find their voice as a leader for the first time.

 

The Book - From In Power to Empower


The book is written in 3 Parts....

Part 1 contains the introduction + through Chapter 5. Afroze starts this book looking at where the idea of leadership started, how it evolved and how it was introduced to the author when she was a child (she tells us when she learned about things like power and lies). Afroze then provides a reflection methodology for individuals to determine their baseline leadership style.

Part 2 contains Chapters 6 through 11. In this part of the book, the author introduces principles of entrepreneurial leadership. These are not principles just for entrepreneurs who want to be leaders; these principles are for anyone who wants to apply entrepreneurial concepts to developing their leadership style. To that end, Afroze shares learnings from her previous experiences, as well as those of others, on how being a leader is not a destination but a journey. Just as a successful business iterates upon itself and its offerings, a successful leader identifies what is working now and iterates upon what needs to be improved in themselves for long term success.

Part 3 contains Chapters 12 through 17. The third part of the book is where the author talks through applications of the entrepreneurial leadership principles learned in previous chapters and applies them to different types of situations, as well as drawing out examples of how it’s all related. For example, when one works on refining their leadership style, such as having a better handle of their emotional skills in a professional work setting, it becomes a natural part of that individual’s baseline leadership style that can be leveraged outside of work as well. If someone is not empowered in one setting, let’s say at the workplace, it impacts how that person feels about themselves elsewhere and vice versa.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2020
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Spring
  • When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

 

Pre-Order Exclusives

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

 

About the Author

Afroze Ali is a Strategy Director at SMITH, an e-commerce consultancy. There, she advises large companies on how to understand their internal and external humans before building out large platforms that impact the entire organization.

Afroze managed to convince herself for years, using a number of excuses, that she was not yet ready to be a leader. After doing an inventory of herself and her experience, she realized that she had been a leader all along, simply because of the way she approached situations and her desire to solve problems. There was no way she wasn’t going to share her learnings with others.

Afroze often felt disenfranchised in various settings, almost like the system was rigged against her. Chances were that in some cases, that might have been the case. She got so used to feeling that way that she could not see past arbitrary limitations that someone, somewhere had dreamt up for her (maybe a parent, a teacher or something in the media). She had to re-adjust her worldview and re-envision what she focused on: opportunities instead of limitations. This book is her liberation story.

For more information you can connect with Afroze at Email: AfrozeTheAuthor@gmail.com 
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/afrozeali
Instagram: @spectacledmemsaab
Twitter: @ideallyafroze

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #InPowerToEmpower and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!


Thanks again,
Afroze Ali

Culture cannot simply be a policy or interview question; every person in the company is responsible for creating, recreating and maintaining a successful company culture.

What are leaders supposed to be doing anyway? Expert, PhD in Organizational Leadership sums it up nicely through when he shared his first lessons in leadership as a boy scout. Additionally, Afroze’s current manager and VP at SMITH shares how she not only finds the right people to be leaders but how she empowers them.

Dispelling Myths about Leadership in Tech: One of my friends and colleagues who is a CTO at an enterprise-level foodservice technology company shares his thoughts and approaches to leadership.

 
You will love this book if you...

are aching to find what makes you unique and marketable, but can’t seem to do enough of the right things to feel successful
are currently in a managerial role but have trouble leading, or wish to move up in your organization
are curious to take an entrepreneurial look at your own leadership style
have often felt yourself to be a misfit when really you never fit in because you were meant to lead

 
From In Power to Empower is a non-fiction book that speaks to professionals early in their careers and experienced professionals who are looking at trying to define what they stand for and find their voice as a leader for the first time.
 
The Book - From In Power to Empower
The book is written in 3 Parts....Part 1 contains the introduction + through Chapter 5. Afroze starts this book looking at where the idea of leadership started, how it evolved and how it was introduced to the author when she was a child (she tells us when she learned about things like power and lies). Afroze then provides a reflection methodology for individuals to determine their baseline leadership style.Part 2 contains Chapters 6 through 11. In this part of the book, the author introduces principles of entrepreneurial leadership. These are not principles just for entrepreneurs who want to be leaders; these principles are for anyone who wants to apply entrepreneurial concepts to developing their leadership style. To that end, Afroze shares learnings from her previous experiences, as well as those of others, on how being a leader is not a destination but a journey. Just as a successful business iterates upon itself and its offerings, a successful leader identifies what is working now and iterates upon what needs to be improved in themselves for long term success.Part 3 contains Chapters 12 through 17. The third part of the book is where the author talks through applications of the entrepreneurial leadership principles learned in previous chapters and applies them to different types of situations, as well as drawing out examples of how it’s all related. For example, when one works on refining their leadership style, such as having a better handle of their emotional skills in a professional work setting, it becomes a natural part of that individual’s baseline leadership style that can be leveraged outside of work as well. If someone is not empowered in one setting, let’s say at the workplace, it impacts how that person feels about themselves elsewhere and vice versa.
 
What I Need & What You'll Get
This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2020
The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Spring
When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.


 
Pre-Order Exclusives
I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)

The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
And more...

 
About the Author
Afroze Ali is a Strategy Director at SMITH, an e-commerce consultancy. There, she advises large companies on how to understand their internal and external humans before building out large platforms that impact the entire organization.Afroze managed to convince herself for years, using a number of excuses, that she was not yet ready to be a leader. After doing an inventory of herself and her experience, she realized that she had been a leader all along, simply because of the way she approached situations and her desire to solve problems. There was no way she wasn’t going to share her learnings with others.Afroze often felt disenfranchised in various settings, almost like the system was rigged against her. Chances were that in some cases, that might have been the case. She got so used to feeling that way that she could not see past arbitrary limitations that someone, somewhere had dreamt up for her (maybe a parent, a teacher or something in the media). She had to re-adjust her worldview and re-envision what she focused on: opportunities instead of limitations. This book is her liberation story.For more information you can connect with Afroze at Email: AfrozeTheAuthor@gmail.com LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/afrozealiInstagram: @spectacledmemsaabTwitter: @ideallyafroze

story:
Help us support writers changing the world

We are driven by the question: Who is telling the story of climate change? The answer, quite simply, is not enough of us. 

 

Our solution is Future Folklore: A Climate Fiction Contest. We’re publishing tales that imagine an equitable and inclusive future, by and for those seeking it. And we’re using Climate Fiction, a subgenre of speculative fiction, to amplify those visions.  Imagination is powerful--it invents reality. 

 

We invite you to contribute to our Indiegogo Fundraiser and be a catalyst for inclusive invention. Crowdfunding allows us to award prize money to selected anthology contributors and to pay our editors, judges, and administrators. We’re striving to lead with integrity and transparency. 

 

Here are some ways we will carry out equitable values throughout fundraising, collecting submissions and while distributing the published anthology:

  • We will actively recruit artists and readers from SCTW’s community, from over 21 countries! Our intention is to encourage submissions from both this community, and one we will grow throughout this project
  • There is no entry fee to submission, eliminating a financial barrier
  • The e-book anthology will be free of charge, so everyone can read it
  • We offer short story prompts that ask writers to reflect on topics like colonization, supremacist systems/ideologies, and our relationship to the earth in critical and fresh ways
  • All submissions will be judged 100% blind by our panel of jurists
  • We will also ask voluntary, confidential questions about gender, sexuality and race in submission materials to better improve recruiting in subsequent contests. 
 

Diversity statement:

We are committed to reflecting, through our communications and final products, the diverse nature of the world we inhabit. We are committed to inclusion regardless of age, race, nationality, medical or disability needs, religion, beliefs, sexual orientation, gender, sex, or parenthood. We also acknowledge that we operate on stolen land.

Milestones

Interview with News@Northeastern

WISE Young Professional Board posts on LinkedIn, Twitter, and Instagram

Why I believe the US botched its early COVID-19 response

What I would say to potential readers that may have some anti-science views

Short Summary

Necessary Symbiosis: What Happens When Science and Government Work Together (and When They Don't) 

My book explores the intersection of science and government, especially how that relationship has evolved over the years and the consequences of that relationship. What happens when that relationship is good, like the scale up of penicillin production? And what happens when that relationship is bad, like politicians bolstering anti-vaccine propaganda?

My name is Vyshnavi Karra and I am the author of Necessary Symbiosis. I wrote this book because as a scientist, I felt like putting facts out into the universe was no longer enough. In the age of the Internet, anyone can Google anything or write anything that can be Googled, which means scientists like myself need to become more involved in advocating their work rather than letting other people spin the facts however they want. You can see how important it is for scientists to engage the public with the COVID-19 pandemic, climate change, anti-vaccine movement, data privacy, etc.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover a means to weaponize science and scientific data in a way that combats fake news, for the greater good. With this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for science advocacy. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you become more involved in science advocacy. Because if we don’t advocate our work as the experts in our niches, someone else will, and they may spin it for their own personal gain.

In this book, you'll learn about Government and Science Miscommunication and How to Weaponize Science for Good, including topics such as:

  • How the US government botched its COVID-19 response in the very beginning, making the fight even harder.
  • How much potential personalized healthcare has for improving health standards.
  • How my friend, Dr. Tess, learned how to communicate science more effectively by talking to an anti-vaxxer.

You will love this book if you’re interested in just how close the relationship between science and government has been in the past and why that relationship is so key to the progress of society. You will also enjoy this book if you’re a scientist and you’re still hesitant about becoming your own advocate but are curious about what that could look like.

Necessary Symbiosis is a non-fiction book that speaks to scientists and science advocates who are looking at policy, science, and how they interact with one another for the first time.

The Book - Necessary Symbiosis

The book is written in 3 Parts....


Part 1 contains the introduction + Chapter 1. These will set the scene for the rest of the book, exploring how the relationship science has with the rest of society has deteriorated and what exactly happened.

Part 2 contains Chapters 2-5. These chapters will cover pandemics, natural disasters, anti-vaxxers, and data privacy. Each chapter will explore how the relationship between science and government evolved and how miscommunication is costing us money, lives, and resources.

Part 3 contains Chapters 6-8. These chapters will cover personalized healthcare, better science advocacy, and the March for Science. Each chapter will not only look at what those topics entail but also what scientists and science advocates can do to weaponize science for the greater good.

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2020
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter
When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook. Click on the pre-order tier, ie. perk, that you would like to ensure that you will get your copy of my book! 

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • A personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A personal, handwritten thank-you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your name will appear in a special Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help me select my cover
  • A book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experience of writing my book
  • And more!

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up to date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

About the Author

Vyshnavi Karra is currently pursuing a Ph.D. in Chemical Engineering at Northeastern University in Boston, MA, focusing on developing a model for biocompatible nanotubes for various applications.

She decided to write this book because she felt frustrated that scientists and science experts were not listened to as often as they should be. And as someone who has always been interested in science policy, she wanted to push scientists to become their own advocates rather than letting third parties spin the findings however they please. Thankfully, more scientists are becoming advocates and involved in science policy debates.

Apart from putting too much on her plate at once, Vyshnavi unwinds by knitting, crocheting, cross-stitching, painting, writing, and reading. (She just doesn’t have a cat yet.)

For more information, you can connect with Vyshnavi at karra.v@northeastern.edu and on Twitter (@KarraVyshnavi), Instagram (@necessarysymbiosis), LinkedIn, and her website (https://karrav6.wixsite.com/vyshnavikarra).

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #NecessarySymbiosis and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of this page
  • Share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Vyshnavi Karra

story:
Story of My Book

Holistic Success: Mind, Body, Soul & Business is about the collapse of the American Dream and how it has become unachievable for most of us.

My name is Paige Hunt and I am the author of Holistic Success: Mind, Body, Soul & Business. I wrote this book because I have realized that the current state of success in the U.S. breeds misery. We set unrealistic standards of success with limited paths for achievement. As a population, we are not happy and we do not feel successful:

  • Only 20% of U.S. citizens feel they are living the full American Dream
  • Less than 50% of U.S. citizens believe they are living any part of the American Dream
  • Only 14% of U.S. adults feel like they are “very happy”
  • Less than 50% of Americans believe that when their children reach their age, their standard of living will be better.

The American Dream is specific, narrow and constricting. Our new dream, the Holistic Dream, must have space for mistakes, route changes, meaningful relationships and balance.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how to find your personal definition of success, I also hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for developing a well-balanced, happy lifestyle. Ultimately, I want you to see Holistic Success: Mind, Body, Soul & Business as a tool to help you realize a new dream, the Holistic Dream, with goals that allow us to focus on and balance success in all areas of our lives.

Holistic Success is a nonfiction book that speaks to students/early career individuals and established professionals alike who want to look at success and happiness in a new way.

In this book, you'll learn about The Holistic Dream and the core principles that contribute to achieving holistic success. You'll hear stories such as...

  • Whitney Wolf's innovative founding of Bumble, the prolific connection and dating app
  • Rob Dyrdek’s, host of MTV’s Ridiculousness and Fantasy Factory, early career successes and failures, and
  • Brene Brown’s struggle with vulnerability

You will love this book if you if you are someone who society’s current definition of success doesn’t fit and likes to challenge the status quo, or if you need to renew or find happiness in your day to day life, find your path or make a career switch.

The Book - Holistic Success: Mind, Body, Soul and Business

The book is written in 3 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-2. These chapters focus on where the American Dream failed us by explaining the history and outcomes of our national ethos. We will then dive into where to go from here in the context of the Holistic Dream.

Part 2 contains chapters 3-9 and discusses the principles of Holistic Success. These principles include vulnerability, passion, collaboration, balance and more, and will include anecdotes from my life and personal mentors as well as insights from individuals like Tony Robbins and Kevin Hart.

Part 3 contains chapter 10 + conclusion. In these chapters we will discuss what the society will look like if we implement the Holistic Dream.

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August, 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Fall.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

  • I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

About the Author

Paige Hunt is a Transformation Coordinator at Johnson Controls, Inc. who manages large scale projects for their Global Products division. She also works with a few non-profits in her local area in different capacities supporting administration and events. Paige has a passion for helping people and uses her unique skills and abilities to make a positive impact in every situation.

Paige has always had the goal to write a book, but became even more set on the idea as she observed family, friends, and coworkers become trapped by the American Dream. Paige hopes to help individuals create personal life paths full of passion that satisfy what they need to be happy.

Paige is also working on attaining her yoga teacher certification and loves to hang out with her cat Rosy. She likes to hike and spend time outside as much as she likes to binge watch Netflix (a lot!) and doesn’t know what she would do without her family and friends.

For more information, you can connect with Paige at paigeellenh@gmail.com and as well as on LinkedIn (https://www.linkedin.com/in/paige-hunt-b49191104/), Instagram (@paigebrownhunt), and Facebook (@paigebrownhunt).

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #HolisticSuccess and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Paige Hunt

Ultimately, I want you to see Holistic Success: Mind, Body, Soul & Business as a tool to help you realize a new dream, the Holistic Dream, with goals that allow us to focus on and balance success in all areas of our lives.Holistic Success is a nonfiction book that speaks to students/early career individuals and established professionals alike who want to look at success and happiness in a new way.In this book, you'll learn about The Holistic Dream and the core principles that contribute to achieving holistic success. You'll hear stories such as...

Whitney Wolf's innovative founding of Bumble, the prolific connection and dating app
Rob Dyrdek’s, host of MTV’s Ridiculousness and Fantasy Factory, early career successes and failures, and
Brene Brown’s struggle with vulnerability

You will love this book if you if you are someone who society’s current definition of success doesn’t fit and likes to challenge the status quo, or if you need to renew or find happiness in your day to day life, find your path or make a career switch.
The Book - Holistic Success: Mind, Body, Soul and Business
The book is written in 3 parts.Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-2. These chapters focus on where the American Dream failed us by explaining the history and outcomes of our national ethos. We will then dive into where to go from here in the context of the Holistic Dream.Part 2 contains chapters 3-9 and discusses the principles of Holistic Success. These principles include vulnerability, passion, collaboration, balance and more, and will include anecdotes from my life and personal mentors as well as insights from individuals like Tony Robbins and Kevin Hart.Part 3 contains chapter 10 + conclusion. In these chapters we will discuss what the society will look like if we implement the Holistic Dream.
What I Need & What You'll Get
This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August, 2021.
The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Fall.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
And much more!

About the Author
Paige Hunt is a Transformation Coordinator at Johnson Controls, Inc. who manages large scale projects for their Global Products division. She also works with a few non-profits in her local area in different capacities supporting administration and events. Paige has a passion for helping people and uses her unique skills and abilities to make a positive impact in every situation.Paige has always had the goal to write a book, but became even more set on the idea as she observed family, friends, and coworkers become trapped by the American Dream. Paige hopes to help individuals create personal life paths full of passion that satisfy what they need to be happy.Paige is also working on attaining her yoga teacher certification and loves to hang out with her cat Rosy. She likes to hike and spend time outside as much as she likes to binge watch Netflix (a lot!) and doesn’t know what she would do without her family and friends.For more information, you can connect with Paige at paigeellenh@gmail.com and as well as on LinkedIn (https://www.linkedin.com/in/paige-hunt-b49191104/), Instagram (@paigebrownhunt), and Facebook (@paigebrownhunt).

story:
Overview

This book is a compilation of intriguing and impactful personal stories from various people that cover the events in their lives that shaped their identity and the truth of how God reshaped the way they defined themselves.

This book is inspired by personal experiences and struggles that have given me a heart for the way my own generation views themselves and the Christian lifestyle. My book will publish February of 2020.
 

Story of My Book


Listening to the List focuses on the titles that define one’s life and their impact on the way one views themselves and the way they live day-to-day. Throughout the stories there is an impactful comparison between the titles we give ourselves, and the reality of the identity Christ would give us instead.

My name is Alexa Holsten and I am the author of Listening to the List. I wrote this book because of the crucial need for my generation to understand the topic of true identity and the impact it makes in one’s life.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how your view of identity affects your relationship with yourself, others, and God, and how changing this view can change your life. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for finding confidence in Christ and who He calls us to be in the midst of our struggles and experiences. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you better love the people around you and help them see themselves as they were created to be.

In this book, you'll learn about the flawed way you view yourself and the life changing truth about how God sees you. You'll learn:

  • How to embrace hard times as an opportunity to shape your character
  • How the people around you can positively or negatively impact the person you will become
  • How choosing to cling to truth over self-given titles will alter your interaction with the world around you
You will love this book if you have questions about how God will use your stories and experiences to open your eyes to the unique identity He has given you. Living by the List is a non-fiction book that speaks to high school and college girls and those around them who are looking at understanding the contrast between the titles given by the world and titles given by God.

This book contains 14 chapters that focus on a variety of conflicting identifiers such as Abandoned vs Chosen, Apathetic vs Obedient, and Broken vs Redeemed.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get


This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 
  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in February 2020.
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter.

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.



I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now. When I publish, you will receive:

  • A personally signed copy of my book
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

 

About the Author

Alexa Holsten got her start as an author and advocate for mental health while studying Psychology and Political Science at Liberty University, one of the largest Christian universities in the world. She is a former contributor to the Odyssey Online, a nationally ranked debater, a lover of any good book. She has displayed her passion to invest in and empower the next generation as a staff member for several leadership programs.

This book is the result of years of struggling with who she is in the eyes of the world and in the eyes of God. In this book you will find what she wishes she could say to every high school and college girl she meets.

Alexa is a Mountain Dew addict who may often be found chasing after the next big adventure and making decisions to do spontaneous things, such as road tripping, painting her bedroom at midnight, or writing a book.

For more information you can connect with Alexa at lexiholsten@gmail.com, @heyalexaholsten on Instagram, and Alexa Holsten on Facebook.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #listeningtothelist and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,

Alexa Holsten

story:
A Short Summary

I love cooking and experimenting with new recipes, and for years I was paid to teach cooking classes and develop new recipes every day. But during my classes I found that most students didn't want to spend the time to learn a dozen new recipes or browse endlessly on food blogs. Rather, most students wanted simple tweaks to improve what they are already cooking. They wanted small ways to expand their cooking repertoire, and simple recipes to boost the flavor of their daily meals. And so I made a cookbook of sauces (and a few other basics)! 

Many of us– including me– cook the same recipes week after week, relying on just a few basic meals to get us through our busy lives. Realizing that something as simple as a sauce can improve even the most basic of our meals, this book was born with support from my incredible boyfriend and excellent collegue Becky Striepe. Gettin' Saucy has captured all this sauce magic you need to make your kitchen a little sassier... and saucer!  

This short collection of deliciously nourishing sauce and staple recipes will make even the simple foods taste better, with minimal effort. 

In Gettin' Saucy, you will get: 

  • 10 vinaigrette and marinade recipes for zestier salads, sassier roasted veggies, and perfect marinated tofu and tempeh
  • 4 creamy dressings to make satisfying salads, noodles, and dips
  • 5 basic sauces with healthier twists, like a date-sweetened barbecue sauce and a pesto made with sunflower and sesame 
  • 4 creamy vegan sauces and gravies for yummy noodles or mashed potatoes
  • 4 sweet sauces to dress up your oatmeal, fruit, or ice cream sundaes
  • 11 plant-based basics that help create a more complete foundation for a more plant-based kitchen.

What We Need & What You Get

This is my first cookbook, and I'm looking for funding just to cover the basics of the first printing and gather pre-orders! Assuming the funding is met, we'll have these books ready just in time for the holidays, so you can give the gift of sauciness this year. 

Funding will be used to cover the following:

  • Printing & shipping fees: Getting the book printed in full color by Lightening Press to show off the beautiful rainbow of plant-based foods, and shipping to our San Francisco homebase.
  • Editing fees: I've been working with the incomparable Becky Striepe to make magic happen for editing and formatting of the book, and the funds will be used to cover her fees.
  • Other book-related fees: ISBN registration and PR fees.

Why Choose Gettin' Saucy?

Whether you're a full vegan or an omnivore, these sauces offer all your meals a ton of flavor and nutrition, spicing up any type of meal you're already making. And if you've always wanted to make the transition to a more plant-based diet– but have always been scared of tofu–  you're covered with the simple cooking tips in our Basics section. 

These recipes use only vegetables, fruits, nuts, seeds, and beans to make decadent and totally delicious sauces, helping you include more plant-based foods in your life and reduce your impact on our planet.

Payin' it Forward

Everyday we have a chance to vote with our dollars for companies and organizations that are contributing to a better planet. We are contributing $2 from the sale of EVERY book during the campaign to an organization that is doing great work in our world: NutritionFacts.org.  

Nutrition Facts is one of my favorite sites for simple (yet engaging) nutrition information. Dr. Michael Greger sifts through international medical literature and distills it down into awesome videos and articles. Nutrition Facts is a totally free website (and one of my favorite sites to reference when I'm blogging). You can learn more about thier work here: https://nutritionfacts.org/donate/

Other Ways You Can Help

Hate to cook? Don't have extra cash to spare? No problem, you can share the love in other ways! 

  • Share this campaign with your foodie friends: use the Indiegogo share tools below! Tag a friend that you think would like the book! 
  • Share the campaign or our blog articles on your own site or newsletter! If you're a blogger and would like to review or share a recipes, email me. 
  • Read our websites: Becky and I work hard to share important food news and wellness tips, and we'd love to have you join us. Sign up at EatDrinkBetter.com and VibrantWellnessJournal.com 
  • Follow @VibrantWellness on Instagram

As a sidenote, this campaign is being run through Important Media, the great company that I've worked with for years, first as a writer and now as the accounts manager. The funds will go into the Important Media PayPal account, and I will be paid a percentage of the sale of each book.
