story:
A Brief History of Money
How We Got Here and What’s Next?


Hi

My name is Chanan and I have just finished my new book “A Brief History of Money – How We Got Here and What’s next”. This book is more pertinent to you and your life today than ever before. I would like to ask for 5 minutes of your time to show you why it's so important that you read my book, how you can help in getting it published, and just how much you will be missing out on if you do not buy a copy of it today.

I promise you this: you have never heard this story before. This is, finally, the complete narrative of money and the economy which have been made out to look so mysterious for so long. After reading this book, you will not only have a much better understanding of  current events,  but you will see fundamental topics like the rise of China, the cost of higher education, the struggle of the middle class , and America’s 59 Trillion dollar debt in a completely new light.

We live in a world of short news cycles and we tend to think and react like “day-traders”. Historical events, however, work on a very different timeframe. Without a holistic and integrated perspective of the path leading to our current situation, you can never truly understand where we are today and where we are headed.

By reading this book, you will understand how we got to the economic situation we are in today. In the process, you will learn many eye-opening facts including how one Friday afternoon meeting in Camp David unintentionally created the world we live in, why we were so strongly blindsided by the 2008 crisis, how the Union was able to fund the civil war and why it matters today, how a meaningless stock manipulation ploy created the most powerful financial institution in the history of the world, and what money is really made to do.

You will also learn of jaw-dropping realities such as why it cost 20 times more to retrofit the San Francisco Bay Bridge than it did to build it 80 years ago, why compensation on Wall Street grew by 15 times in the past three decades while those on Main Street hardly grew with cost of living, and why the frightening yet euphoric boom and bust cycles are a norm.  These and many more “whys” will become clearer as you become more knowledgeable, eloquent, and informed about the state of our world and the fascinating history of money and finance.

To finalize the publishing of this thrilling project and to spread the word, I’ve set a budget of $22,500, of which at least $8,500 I hope to raise through pre-sales and crowdfunding!

I promise you that this book, based on 4 years of relentless research, will do much more than just entertain you , it will equip you with valuable knowledge, wisdom, and understanding which you will not find so simply summarized and communicated anywhere else. So join, pre-buy and be part of the publishing this thrilling book.

Thanks!

Chanan


Readers review:

“I’ve read many books on money so I must admit I was skeptical.  But I was pleasantly surprised.  It was a fascinating read. By walking through the turning points in the history of money, I came away understanding what is happening today.  This excellent book made our current financial system so much more clear.  And more importantly, it gives a compelling view of where we are headed and what opportunities and pitfalls lay in the coming years”.  

David Drum, VP Business Development H&H Labs


“This is a must-read book! Its birds-eye view of today’s failing monetary policies, coupled with historical connections, allows you to truly grasp money’s inner workings, giving you a glimpse of possible outcomes. It completely changed the way I looked at “money”…so interesting. And, it’s amazing what the media is NOT telling us. You will not regret reading this one!”

Jessee Allread, Contributing Editor Rugged PC Review


About me and why I spent 4 years researching and writing this book? 

In my short time on earth (ok, maybe not so short - J) I have managed to gather quite a few experiences and different perspectives on life. I was a trial lawyer but also a Union leader, an infantry Captain and company commander but also a co-author of a book on Italian gourmet travel. I also lived and worked in three different continents. These contrasting experiences have given me a broad and global perspective.

As a tech CEO based in the Silicon Valley, I am a business person by profession and historian by practice. In my time as a CEO in high tech, I have endured both the 2000 and 2008 crises and also served as a strategic consultant for Apple in the early days of eCommerce. For me, writing about the history of money is about more than just studying the past that has shaped my life—it concerns the future that awaits my four children, their children and the American people.

it did to build it 80 years ago, why compensation on Wall Street grew by 15
times in the past three decades while those on Main Street hardly grew with
cost of living, and why the frightening yet euphoric boom and bust cycles are a
norm.  These and many more “whys” will
become clearer as you become more knowledgeable, eloquent, and informed about
the state of our world and the fascinating history of money and finance.

To finalize
the publishing of this thrilling project and to spread the word, I’ve set a
budget of $22,500, of which at least $8,500 I hope to raise through pre-sales and crowdfunding!
I promise you that this book, based on 4
years of relentless research, will do much more than just entertain you , it
will equip you with valuable knowledge, wisdom, and understanding which you
will not find so simply summarized and communicated anywhere else. So
join, pre-buy and be part of the publishing this thrilling book.
Thanks!
Chanan


Readers
review:
“I’ve read many books on money so I must admit I was
skeptical.  But I was pleasantly surprised.  It was a fascinating read. By walking
through the turning points in the history of money, I came away understanding
what is happening today.  This excellent book made our current financial
system so much more clear.  And more importantly, it gives a compelling
view of where we are headed and what opportunities and pitfalls lay in the
coming years”.  
David Drum, VP Business Development H&H Labs

“This is a must-read book! Its birds-eye view of today’s failing monetary policies, coupled with historical connections, allows you to truly grasp money’s inner workings, giving you a glimpse of possible outcomes. It completely changed the way I looked at “money”…so interesting. And, it’s amazing what the media is NOT telling us. You will not regret reading this one!”
Jessee Allread, Contributing Editor Rugged PC Review


About me and why I spent 4 years researching and writing this
book?  
In my
short time on earth (ok, maybe not so short - J) I have managed to gather quite a
few experiences and different perspectives on life. I was a trial lawyer but
also a Union leader, an infantry Captain and company commander but also a co-author of a book on Italian gourmet travel. I also lived and worked in three
different continents. These contrasting experiences have given me a broad and
global perspective. 
As a tech
CEO based in the Silicon Valley, I am a business person by profession and
historian by practice. In my time as a CEO in high tech, I have endured both the
2000 and 2008 crises and also served as a strategic consultant for Apple in the
early days of eCommerce. For me, writing about the history of money is
about more than just studying the past that has shaped my life—it concerns the
future that awaits my four children, their children and the American people.

story:
Short Summary


My friend (and now colleague) Keri and I met this summer in an internship with a literary journal. We both learned so much from it, and arguably the most important thing we learned is that we love working for magazines: the reading, the choosing, the editing, the connecting with artists from all around the world.

We decided to set up our own magazine, and we called it "Transcendence", which is defined as "the act of being outside consciousness and understanding". We hired readers for prose, poetry, and art, and Executive Editors for each of those categories. The submission period opened and high-quality submissions poured in. We're now about to send out our final acceptance and rejection letters and begin to craft Issue One of Transcendence Magazine.

But we do need a little help. 


What We Need & What you get

Here's what we need money for: 

  • Website fees. We're currently looking at getting a domain name.
  • While right now we are only digital, it is our dream to one day be in print. Printing costs money, as does sending the printed issues to all our subscribers. The majority of the funds we raise will be saved for this purpose.
  • We want to pay our contributors for their work. They put so much heart, time and effort into their pieces, and they deserve a reward for it. 
  • Other expenses, promotional and logistical in nature.

Here's what you will get for helping us:

  • Any of the perks that come with donating. These include a free digital copy, a two-year long subscription to Transcendence (which you will pay nothing for!), and a care package that will include anything of your choosing and a few other goodies.
  • Knowledge that you have contributed to making come true. I know that's cheesy and cliche, but trust me, you really will make that happen.
  • Gratitude from Keri, Stephanie, Anna and me, and all of our readers and contributors. I will send you messages thanking you for your support so often that I will begin to get annoying. Anna will call you up on Skype and embarrass you with crying, or (if tears of gratitude make you uncomfortable) write you a poem on demand.


The Impact

When you donate, know that you're helping out the arts, even if it is in a really small way. You're giving a voice to artists who work with words or with images - artists who come from all over the globe - and you're strengthening our little (but ever-expanding) community.


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that times are tough, so let us assure you that there are other (free!) ways you can help our magazine. What we would love you to do is to spread the word! Share this campaign and our website address on Twitter, Facebook and Tumblr. More importantly, contact any teenage artists or writers you know: whether it's their first chance at a publication or another item to add to their creative resume, or if they have a desire to read excellent literature and view excellent art, let them know what we're doing. 

We're so grateful for whatever help you can give.

story:
Dear friends,

Many of you have written to me asking when I'm going to publish the next novels of the Way of the Shaman. I keep writing new books of this and other LitRPG series which are currently published in Russian. The royalties from these books I invest into their English translations for you. But at the moment, the Russian ruble is dropping, decimating my earnings. Which is why, considering how many of you are waiting for new Shaman books, I decided to turn to you to help me raise enough money to translate the Kartoss Gambit (The Way of the Shaman: Book #2).

Every donor will receive his or her personal bonus:

$5 : An e-card from the author and an electronic copy of the Kartoss Gambit
$10 : An e-card from the author, an electronic copy of the Kartoss Gambit and a mention in the book's Acknowledgments
$20 : All of the above plus a thank-you postcard written by the author mailed to your address
$40 : All of the above plus a paperback copy of the Kartoss Gambit (The Way of the Shaman: Book #1) with the author's handwritten inscription of your choice
$60+ : All of the above plus a paperback copy of Survival Quest (The Way of the Shaman: Book #1) with the author's handwritten inscription of your choice

The book is already written. The translator will start working straight away. Your help will allow the Kartoss Gambit to hit Amazon on October 2015

I thank you all in advance!

Sincerely,

Vasily Mahanenko

story:
Hello!  My name is Chance and I am a Yellow Lab!  I'm a helper dog, for my Mom who can't walk too good.

I am going to need to retire soon, and we are trying to find a new helper dog before I have to retire.

Trouble is, all the places around here demand  that mom finds a new home for me before she can apply!

But mom doesn’t want to lose me!
I don’t want to lose mom!

We love each other very, very much.
To mom, I am much more than a just service dog!

I am her companion, her family member, and her baby.
So she has decided that she and I will stay together, forever!

Mom has tried many different places throughout the US, but some won’t accept her because we live in Canada; others won’t accept her because she won’t give me up.

She did find one place in California that will accept her,
and allow us all to stay together as a family.   Mom needs money to go to California and get my Successor dog.  She needs to stay down there for the 2 week team training.

The problem is, it costs a lot of money; and me and mom sure could use your help in raising the needed funds.


Other ways to help!

If you, or someone you love is a Lab lover, this tee might make a great Christmas gift!

http://teespring.com/iluvelabs

story:
Breve reseña

Tras cuatro años de recopilación y toma de contacto con las peñas del Athletic Club, la Peña Gaínza de Minglanilla quiere hacer realidad el sueño de ver impreso su libro: un testimonio gráfico e histórico de la afición rojiblanca repartida por todo el mundo.  Para ello cuenta con la dedicación y asesoramiento de Innovamk.

Innovamk es una agencia de marketing y comunicación de Bilbao. Su misión, en este caso, es colaborar con la Peña Piru Gainza de Minglanilla en la edición y distribución de "La verdadera fuerza del león", el libro sobre la historia de las peñas del Athletic Club de Bilbao, aportando su experiencia en el ámbito del diseño gráfico y la comunicación. 

Así hemos logrado incorporar al libro opiniones de contrastadas figuras relacionadas con el Athletic Club, jugadores ( Guerrero, Iribar, Iraia Iturregi..), entrenadores (Caparrós, Goikoetxea..). El libro está prologado por el actual presidente del Athletic Club, Josu Urrutia.

Contribuyendo con esta campaña ayudarás a la financiación de los costes de edición, maquetación,impresión y distribución del libro, que la peña no puede sufragar.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Cantidades necesarias para realizar el proyecto:

  • Maquetación del libro, impresión, y mailing inicial para 5000 ejemplares.
    Fecha prevista, 15/03/2015.  Cantidad necesaria: 43.530 €
  • Creación de página web, estrategia digital, difusión en redes sociales, publicidad online...
    Fecha prevista, 01/02/2015. Cantidad necesaria: 23.159,50 €  
  • Distribución de los ejemplares a los compradores. El libro se vende a través de la página web, no en tiendas físicas. Necesario alguien que centralice los envíos.
    Fecha prevista: 31/03/2015. Cantidad necesaria: 11.605 €

El impacto

  • La Peña  Piru Gainza de Minglanilla es una de las más antiguas en España, fundada en 1950 (este año cumple los 65 años desde su fundación). Ha tenido el honor de organizar/celebrar un Congreso Internacional de Peñas, en el que obtuvo el récord de participación en un evento tal. Ahora, con motivo de su 65º Aniversario, pretende dar forma a su sueño, mostrar a los aficionados al futbol en general, y a los del Athletic Club en particular, lo que denominan "La Verdadera Fuerza del León", es decir, sus aficionados y sus peñas.
  • Tras más de 4 años recopilando historias, anécdotas, fotografías..., consideran que es el momento de dar luz verde al proyecto, el cual, en la actual situación económica, sería inviable sin ayuda externa.
  • Además, la Peña Gainza de Minglanilla aportará, por cada libro vendido, 2 € a la Fundación Athletic Club.
  • ¡Impresionante!... Así definiríamos la entrega y la ilusión que, a día de hoy, tienen todos los integrantes de la Peña.

Riesgos y desafíos

Desde InnovaMk cogimos el guante lanzado por los integrantes de la Peña Gainza y nos ofrecimos para ayudar a la misma y poder madurar su proyecto y, finalmente, tratar de sacarlo a la luz. Es por ello que hemos pensado en esta campaña de Crowdfounding, para obtener los fondos necesarios para editar el libro y poder ponerlo a la venta en una cantidad que consideramos justa.

Somos conscientes de la dificultad del proyecto, pero, no podemos dejar pasar la oportunidad de recaudar fondos por esta vía. En caso de no lograr la cantidad total, recurriremos a otras vías de financiación, siempre con el objetivo claro de ayudar a que la Peña Gainza no tenga que hacerse cargo de un coste económico elevado... es decir, el libro se tiene que hacer, sí o sí...

Por ello, trataremos de acudir a cuantos eventos sea posible (encuentros de hermanamiento, fiestas populares, etc) para mostrar el proyecto y tratar de conseguir la mayor cantidad de reservas de libros que sea posible.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

No todo el mundo puede colaborar económicamente con el proyecto, pero sí que puede difundir el mismo a través de las RR.SS.

  • Difunde esta campaña.
  • Reserva tu ejemplar del libro:  http://on.fb.me/1DgWVxy
  • Usa las herramientas para compartir de Indiegogo.

story:
¡Atención!
Aunque la campaña haya finalizado, si aún te interesa adquirir una copia del libro, comunícate con nosotros a: elgrupodomak@gmail.com o por facebook

Aceptamos pagos por Abitab o Paypal.

Mi nombre es Lucía, algunos quizás me conozcan como Lumaga de ver mis dibujos en sitios como DeviantART o tumblr. Vivo en Uruguay, trabajo actualmente como artista de videojuegos para Inzen Studio en Singapur, y para Lab Zero Games como dibujante clean-up para el juego Skullgirls.

Esta campaña es para fundar el primer tomo de una novela en la que he estado trabajando durante más de once años. Comencé a escribir el primer tomo de "El grupo Domak" en agosto del 2003 y terminé de escribir el cuarto y último tomo en diciembre del 2010, desde entonces he estado dedicándome a pulir mi escritura, para volverlo un trabajo de calidad. No me canso de leer y repasar esta historia que tanto me gusta, espero poder compartirla y llevarla al papel con la ayuda de todos ustedes.

Con su colaboración voy a poder mandar a imprimir una primera edición (500 ejemplares) de “El grupo Domak: Los siete puntos”, que es la primera parte de la saga de cuatro libros. También espero que eso sirva de puntapié inicial para luego continuar editando e imprimiendo los siguientes tres tomos, hasta llegar a compartir esta historia hasta el final.


La primer meta es imprimir 500 ejemplares en tapa rústica. El total recaudado irá destinado a saldar el precio de imprenta, los costos de las recompensas, el packaging, los envíos y la comisión que cobra Indiegogo. Si alcanzamos esa meta, aspiraremos a la siguiente, y se revelarán metas mayores.



Si no cuentas con tarjeta de crédito, o cuenta de paypal, pero aún así quieres adquirir alguna de las recompensas, comunícate conmigo a la siguiente dirección de email y veremos qué hacer: elgrupodomak@gmail.com


Siempre puedes cambiar el monto de tu contribución a uno más alto. Por eso, si decides adquirir una recompensa más cara, o si olvidaste agregar el precio del envío, no te preocupes, puedes hacerlo luego.


"Los siete puntos" se encuentra en la etapa final de su desarrollo. El libro está escrito y ya terminado. Ha sido revisado por varias personas que me dieron sus críticas constructivas y su ayuda profesional. Ya está diagramado y los bocetos de las ilustraciones que van a ir en el interior están creados, me voy a dedicar a entintarlos mientras dure la campaña. Estando todo casi pronto, tengo planeado mandar a imprenta el libro pocos días después de terminada esta campaña, así que todos estarían recibiendo sus libros y recompensas poco después de eso.

La realización de este proyecto significaría el comienzo de "El grupo Domak", y me va a permitir continuar apostando a mis realizaciones, novelas y comics que quiera publicar en un futuro, no sólo relacionadas con el mundo de Domak, tengo muchas historias para contar y espero poder hacerlas llegar a ustedes.

¿Por qué financiamiento flexible?
El financiamiento fijo de indiegogo no permite el uso de tarjetas de crédito para pagar las recompensas, y Paypal es una plataforma poco conocida en Uruguay, así que por esa razón he decidido dejar abierta la posibilidad de que la gente pague con tarjeta de crédito.

¿Y si no se alcanza la cifra?
Si no alcanzamos la meta, yo me voy a encargar del dinero que haya que agregar para saldar el costo de la impresión de los libros y las recompensas que se hayan pedido. Pero recuerden, si la meta es alcanzada, luego habrá metas mayores y eso significaría beneficios para todos los que hayan aportado.



Aunque no puedas colaborar pagando por las recompensas, me ayudaría muchísimo que compartieras e hicieras correr la voz, que se lo contaras a tus amigos y familiares, a tus conocidos y no tan conocidos. Puedes usar los botones para compartir de Indiegogo, que encontrarás a la izquierda en esta página. Mientras más gente se entere de la existencia de "El grupo Domak" más ambicioso se va a volver este proyecto :D


Puedes encontrar preguntas y respuestas acerca de la campaña aquí.
Puedes ver más contenido relacionado con "El grupo Domak" y seguir las últimas actualizaciones dándole like a su página de facebook aquí.

Por cualquier comentario o inquietud, también puedes contactarme a la siguiente dirección de email: elgrupodomak@gmail.com


Muchas gracias por haber leído hasta acá.
Espero que con tu ayuda esto se vuelva el inicio de algo grande.

Esta campaña es para fundar el primer tomo de una novela en la que he estado trabajando durante más de once años. Comencé a escribir el primer tomo de "El grupo Domak" en agosto del 2003 y terminé de escribir el cuarto y último tomo en diciembre del 2010, desde entonces he estado dedicándome a pulir mi escritura, para volverlo un trabajo de calidad. No me canso de leer y repasar esta historia que tanto me gusta, espero poder compartirla y llevarla al papel con la ayuda de todos ustedes.
Con su colaboración voy a poder mandar a imprimir una primera edición (500 ejemplares) de “El grupo Domak: Los siete puntos”, que es la primera parte de la saga de cuatro libros. También espero que eso sirva de puntapié inicial para luego continuar editando e imprimiendo los siguientes tres tomos, hasta llegar a compartir esta historia hasta el final.La primer meta es imprimir 500 ejemplares en tapa rústica. El total recaudado irá destinado a saldar el precio de imprenta, los costos de las recompensas, el packaging, los envíos y la comisión que cobra Indiegogo. Si alcanzamos esa meta, aspiraremos a la siguiente, y se revelarán metas mayores.Si no cuentas con tarjeta de crédito, o cuenta de paypal, pero aún así quieres adquirir alguna de las recompensas, comunícate conmigo a la siguiente dirección de email y veremos qué hacer: elgrupodomak@gmail.comSiempre puedes cambiar el monto de tu contribución a uno más alto. Por eso, si decides adquirir una recompensa más cara, o si olvidaste agregar el precio del envío, no te preocupes, puedes hacerlo luego."Los siete puntos" se encuentra en la etapa final de su desarrollo. El libro está escrito y ya terminado. Ha sido revisado por varias personas que me dieron sus críticas constructivas y su ayuda profesional. Ya está diagramado y los bocetos de las ilustraciones que van a ir en el interior están creados, me voy a dedicar a entintarlos mientras dure la campaña. Estando todo casi pronto, tengo planeado mandar a imprenta el libro pocos días después de terminada esta campaña, así que todos estarían recibiendo sus libros y recompensas poco después de eso.La realización de este proyecto significaría el comienzo de "El grupo Domak", y me va a permitir continuar apostando a mis realizaciones, novelas y comics que quiera publicar en un futuro, no sólo relacionadas con el mundo de Domak, tengo muchas historias para contar y espero poder hacerlas llegar a ustedes.¿Por qué financiamiento flexible?El financiamiento fijo de indiegogo no permite el uso de tarjetas de crédito para pagar las recompensas, y Paypal es una plataforma poco conocida en Uruguay, así que por esa razón he decidido dejar abierta la posibilidad de que la gente pague con tarjeta de crédito.¿Y si no se alcanza la cifra?Si no alcanzamos la meta, yo me voy a encargar del dinero que haya que agregar para saldar el costo de la impresión de los libros y las recompensas que se hayan pedido. Pero recuerden, si la meta es alcanzada, luego habrá metas mayores y eso significaría beneficios para todos los que hayan aportado.Aunque no puedas colaborar pagando por las recompensas, me ayudaría muchísimo que compartieras e hicieras correr la voz, que se lo contaras a tus amigos y familiares, a tus conocidos y no tan conocidos. Puedes usar los botones para compartir de Indiegogo, que encontrarás a la izquierda en esta página. Mientras más gente se entere de la existencia de "El grupo Domak" más ambicioso se va a volver este proyecto :DPuedes encontrar preguntas y respuestas acerca de la campaña aquí.
Puedes ver más contenido relacionado con "El grupo Domak" y seguir las últimas actualizaciones dándole like a su página de facebook aquí.

Por cualquier comentario o inquietud, también puedes contactarme a la siguiente dirección de email: elgrupodomak@gmail.com

Muchas gracias por haber leído hasta acá.
Espero que con tu ayuda esto se vuelva el inicio de algo grande.

story:
Our Story

Bellow Literary Journal is an independent print journal which collects the finest cerebral output of today.  We will publish poetry, short fiction, plays, bits of conversation,  micro-fiction, and visual art.  

The Impact

We want to challenge the intelligence.  Our Bellow is a collective one.  Each page will flow seamlessly into the next, incorporating every medium at our disposal and redefining the relationship between sound, text, and visual art. 


What We Need & What You Get

Right now, Bellow does not have its own legs on which to stand.  For the time being, it's standing precariously at the gates of a literary graveyard.  For Bellow to make it, we're asking for small contributions that will finance: 1. Marketing and advertising; 2.  A launch party with refreshments, food, and readings at the Maple Street Bookstore, New Orleans, LA; 3. The ability to buy our own books from the printer!  This way we can sell them ourselves and hope hope hope to break even.  


We have perks!


To become a 'Bellower', donate at least five dollars, and in return, you will receive credit on our official website for officially being a part of our creative process.


To be 'Howling Mad', donate at least 20 dollars, and you will receive a free copy of the journal upon its completion, as well as a reserved seat at our launch party at the Maple Street Book Store.  If you cannot attend due to foreseen illness or geography, let us know, and we'll leave your seat open. 


To be a 'Philanthropist', donate at least 75 dollars to receive two free copies of the journal, a reserved seat at our launch party, and credit on our website.


Other Ways You Can Help

If money isn't your thing, you can help us by directing your rich friends to our website, www.bellowliteraryjournal.com, or to this campaign.  


We thank you all for helping Bellow bellow!


Humbly,


Patrick Sugrue

Editor-in-Chief

Every year the Brothers of the Delta Delta chapter of Sigma Chi look for new various outlets to raise awareness for their annual philanthropy, Derby Days. This year, as years in past, the charities we will be donating to will be the Huntsman Cancer Foundation as well as Riley's Children’s Hospital. It is our goal this year to raise $5,000 via this campaign.

As in years past, a points system will be used to dictate which of the participating sororities will win the event.

In this case, 1 point will be awarded for every dollar pledged, so please when donating note your chapter.

 

Thanks and we look to have another great Derby Days.

Instructions for donation on behalf of Sigma Chi Brother

 

Instructions for donation on behalf of Sorority

 

 

Deby Down,

 

Chris Lee

Stuart Hester

Delta Delta '14

Sigma Chi Derby Day's co-chairs

story:
What are we doing?

We are producing the first volume of four - The Vulture:  Book 1, A Collection of Content  Issues 1-51.  From its inception, we have dreamed of publishing a high-quality edition of The Vulture.  What better way to highlight the best of our early content than to put them in book form!

The Vulture: Book 1 will be a softcover book with approximately 120 pages and comparable in size to The Vulture micro-magazine, which is 8 ½ x 7.

We will be compiling a selection of content from The Vulture in a series of four books.  Our projected publishing dates are as follows: 

  •   The Vulture:  Book 1 (from issues 1-51) released in November 2014. 
  •   The Vulture:  Book 2 (from issues 52-100) to be released March 2015. 
  •   The Vulture:  Book 3 (from issues 101-150) to be released in July 2015.
  •   The Vulture:  Book 4 (from issues 151 forward) to be released in  November 2015.


How will Book 1  be produced?

For four years we have been producing a 16-page, micro-magazine on a weekly basis.  Publishing a book is not that different.  There will be one major difference - we are working with a short-run book printer here in the United States to print the book for us.  

Who are we?

We are Larry Holland and Laura Simoneau - co-publishers, artists, craftspeople, small business entrepreneurs, parents, and partners (business and life).


The Vulture - What's that?

The Vulture was a micro-magazine;  a small, self-published, free weekly in Bellows Falls, Vermont.  Over the past 4 years we have printed 207 issues.  We believed we did not have to look any further than our own community to find talented writers, authors, photographers, and artists to produce an exceptional publication.  The Vulture was named after the turkey vultures that roost in the area through the summer.


Our Goal

We set a goal of $6,000.00 to pay for our production costs:  graphic design, page layout, selection of content, and printing.  

We will be fulfilling our preorders and ordering a limited number of additional copies.  If you would like to guarantee owning a copy of the book, we recommend you order your copy now.  We are also taking orders by mail with check or money order for those who are not interested in ordering online.  Please mail these to:  The Vulture, P.O. Box 265, Bellows Falls, VT,  05101.  We will accept mail orders until November 1, 2014.

UPDATE: Thanks to you, we've reached our minimum goal in just a few days! If you'd still like to help out, please feel free– the more donations we receive, the more copies we can print and distrubute. Thank you again for all of your support!

Font features the creative work of Hofstra's student body, including everything from poetry and photography to plays and digital art. After being discontinued a few years ago, Font was restarted by the Hofstra English Society at the beginning of last semester, and showed immediate success after just one issue. We are currently the only literary magazine on campus. We take pride in showcasing the incredible talent of the Hofstra student body, as well as crafting a beautiful publication. Our wonderful staff, and the magazine itself, has grown in just a few months of existence, and we hope to continue publishing Font in the years to come.

Unfortunately, the English Society has run into unforeseen financial issues. Although our magazine is complete and ready for publication, our budgetary problems have made it impossible to print the magazine. This semester, we received double the submissions of the last issue. The produced magazine includes some of the best student writing and artwork we have ever seen. It's heartbreaking to think that all of these amazing student contributions, as well as the work of our dedicated staff, might not be shared with the rest of the Hofstra community.

Please help us share this amazing publication. Any donations, no matter how small, put us one step closer to printing Hofstra's only literary magazine. The more we receive, the more copies we will have to distribute. Whether you decide to donate or not, thank you for taking the time to read our page and for your interest in our magazine.

If you'd like to donate with a check or cash rather than a credit card, contact us at hofenglishsociety@gmail.com.

If you'd like to see last semester's magazine, click here.

If you are a current Hofstra student and would like to submit to next semester's magazine, email us at hofenglishsociety@gmail.com.

story:
The Kind Self-Healing Book

Over the years, readers of my personal growth blog, Guess What Normal Is, have asked: How do I start this work? Where do I start? How do I begin to untangle the ill effects of my less-than-perfect-childhood? How do I help myself? How do I heal myself? My reply is this book, The Kind Self-Healing Book.  

Your Support  

Books change lives, andThe Kind Self-Healing Book aims to change lives. You can be part of that!  

  • When a reader tells me that I've changed their life or given them courage, it makes my day. You can be a part of that feeling!
  • I have 20 years of writing experience, including a MFA in Creative Writing.
  • I've worked in the book publishing industry for 20 years and know what it takes to produce a quality book that serves and delights people.  

The Book's 5 Promises 

Working through the book will itself be an act of healing for readers. The Kind Self-Healing Book provides tools for achieving the following outcomes:

  • Learn the process of cultivating self-esteem so that your self-esteem is a guiding constant in your life, and much less hit or miss.
  • Discomfort felt when advocating for yourself will become less scary and will no longer keep you from speaking up about your needs.
  • The purpose that drives your actions will shift to your desires and needs and away from anxiety and what you think others want of you.  
  • You'll learn how to remain centered and calm in the face of criticism (or perceived criticism) and more comfortable expressing your true self.
  • You'll become more comfortable in intimate relationships and won't be distracted by a desire to control situations because you'll have moved from living in your head to living in the present moment.  

What I Need & What You Get

Your support will help me transform my manuscript into a real book that people can buy:

  • The $8,910 will cover all of the following costs:  hiring professionals to copyedit my manuscript, design the book's interior layout, design a book cover, copywriting for the back cover, proofread the final proof of the book, purchase ISBNs for print and ebook formats, format and upload the ebook files (to Amazon.com's CreateSpace), IndieGoGo's cut (4%), and that's it.   
  • The perks of supporting this project are unique, personal, and aimed at enhancing your happiness!
  • If I don't reach my goal, nothing happens. Isn't that sad?  

Assuming this funding comes together, The Kind Self-Healing Book will be released this winter. 

Other Ways to Help

You can help a lot by just spreading the word about my book. You know people I don't know. Please tell people you know about my book. The more people who know about this project, the better chance it has of becoming fully funded.          

* Please click on the social media icons below and spread the word! *

Thank You!

story:
Glavni podržavatelj kampanje El Comandante je Big Blue Bubble i njihov CEO Damir Šlogar, za prijatelje Slogy. Damir je otišao iz Hrvatske pred... dosta godina... i u Kanadi osnovao Big Blue Bubble, kompaniju koja se bavi razvojem igara, primarno za mobilne platforme. Jedna su od najuspješnijih i najvećih kompanija za mobilni gaming na svijetu, a tijekom kampanje će svakako biti još prilika da diskretno spomenemo njihove uspjehe i dostignuća... 

Kampanja se odsad službeno zove Big Blue Bubble - El Comandante. Dvjesto godina nesreće smo odbacili jer ne zvuči baš "sponzorski" LOL, ali spika o nevoljama Bolivije i Paragvaja ostaje, priča nema uljepšavanja....

Iako je glavni cilj ispunjen, svaki prilog je dobrodošao i bit će popraćen obilnom zahvalnošću, jer ekspedicija ovakvog tipa ima prilične troškove....

Wikipedia entry za Big Blue Bubble:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Blue_Bubble

Uz glavnog sponzora Big Blue Bubble, koji je već predstavljen, kampanja El Comandante ima još tri veća dobrotvora, u paketu imena na koje sam posebno ponosan - Neoliberal Bastard! Haha, paket Neoliberal Bastard. Hvala im! Hvala svima koji su podržali projekt, ma kojim iznosom!

Ukratko, predstavljanje tri Neoliberal Bastarda....

Prvi je (abecedno) HROUG, kultna te legendarna Hrvatska udruga Oracle korisnika. Jedna od najstarijih informatičkih udruga u HR, okuplja korisnike Oraclea. Ako ste u IT-u, znate što je Oracle, ako niste - ni ne uznemiravajte se previše.... neka baza podataka, na kojoj se vjerojatno čuva.... pa više manje sve što itko zna o vama, negdje, a i mnogo više od toga. HROUG okuplja korisnike Oraclea u Hrvatskoj, kako bi im pomogao u zajedničkim problemima, edukaciji, po potrebi zajedničkom nastupu prema samom Oracleu (kao svojevrsni sindikat LOL, samo en uposlenika nego korisnika), a HROUG konferencije i druženja imaju legendaran status na IT sceni.

Drugi je Manpower Group, multinacionalna tvrtka sa sjedištem u Milwaukeeju, SAD. Gotovo 70 godina, ManpowerGroup tvrtkama diljem svijeta pruža sveobuhvatna rješenja na području zapošljavanja i razvoja ljudskih potencijala. Kao najveća i najinovativnija globalna tvrtka u svojoj industriji, ManpowerGroup s više od 30.000 zaposlenih u 3.000 ureda i 80 zemalja i teritorija, godišnje provodi 12 milijuna intervjua u potrazi za najboljim talentima. Zaposlenici s odgovarajućim vještinama i iskustvom su postali najoskudniji resurs. Nude sve usluge iz područja ljudskih resursa, od regrutacije i pred selekcije do testiranja i intervjua do skraćivanja vremena zapošljavanja i vaših troškova.

Treći (abecedno) je Omnizon Networks, dosad poznat kao Redok. Rebranding u Omnizon Networks je bitan element sudjelovanja u ovom projektu, pa ga zato naglašavamo. Omnizon (ex Redok) je na sceni od svibnja 2009. godine, a pozicionirali su se kao informacijski posrednik u procesu razmjene elektroničkih dokumenata, izrade porezno priznatog elektroničkog računa (eRačun) i arhive elektroničkih dokumenata u B2B i B2G okruženju. Osnovni im je cilj osiguranje optimalne informatičke infrastrukture, procesa i procedura za razmjenu elektroničkih dokumenata kako bi svojim korisnicima pružili uslugu koja će njihovo poslovanje učiniti još konkurentnijim. Bitan čimbenik predstavlja Megatrend grupacija sa svojim ljudskim resursima koji im kontinuirano stoje na raspolaganju.

Bit će još prilike za upoznavanje s darežljivcima, a sad, još malo i okrećemo se putopisanju, op op!

*********

"Everybody gets what he wants. I wanted a mission, and for all my sins they gave me one."

There is a summary in English at the very bottom of this page. 

Pozadinska glazba u videu je "Bolivia" iz soundtracka za legendarni film Scarface, autor je Giorgio Moroder i nadam se da me neće tužiti za ovu malu posudbicu. Ta stvar svira kad Tony ide na dogovore kod Sose u –  naravno, Boliviju.

Kad se spomene Južna Amerika, na što prvo pomislite?

Brazil, samba, nogomet, Argentina, Messi, džungle Amazone, Buenos Aires, tango, možda na Čile, eventualno Kolumbiju…. Već malo teže na Venecuelu, još teže na Peru i Ekvador…. A dvije zemlje koje su vjerojatno pri dnu asocijacija prosječnog razmišljatelja o Južnoj Americi su – Bolivija i Paragvaj…. Posebno Paragvaj, o kojem većina Hrvata ne bi znala reći ni dvije rečenice.

Ove dvije zemlje proglasio sam najnesretnijima na cijelom kontinentu, i u naslov stavio parafrazu romana Gabriela Garcie Marqueza, pisca koji vjerojatno najbolje utjelovljuje duh južnoameričke melankolije.

Sto godina samoće, dvjesto godina nesreće.

Obzirom na moje malo "pomaknute" putopisne interese, Bolivija i Paragvaj su mi najzanimljivije zemlje kontinenta. Možda niste znali da, iako su bez izlaza na more, obje zemlje imaju mornaricu i zbog povijesnih razloga jako drže do nje. Obje imaju i hrvatsku dijasporu, i to dijasporu s vrlo zanimljivim sudbinama i poviješću. Imaju i još dosta toga zajedničkog i različitog, ali na to ćemo doći na vrijeme…

Dakle plan je otići u Boliviju i Paragvaj, vrludati uzduž i poprijeko – malo džipom, malo pješke, a malo klatareći se na magarcu – prepričati najzanimljivija opažanja i ispucati hrpu fotografija.

Primijetit ćete da su dijelovi teksta koji nisu specifično vezani za Dvjesto godina... slični kao i za lanjsku, vrlo uspješnu kampanju za himalajsku provinciju Mustang, i preklanjsku na Pamirski trakt, jer osnovna ideja je ista – otići negdje, u neku rupu svijeta za koju je malo tko čuo, i složiti putopis bogat jakim fotografijama (to zovem "fotopis").

Zašto biste trebali podržati ovu kampanju?

Zato što ti osobno koji ovo čitaš nećeš nikad u životu otići tamo. Ne zanima te, ne da ti se, daleko je.... IPAK, imaš priliku sudjelovati u odlasku u zemlje nesreće – preko ove kampanje! Neka atom tebe ipak ide tamo, atom zvan dolar, kuna, dojčmarka. Gledat ćeš fotke, postove odande i pomisiliti "i djelić mene je sad tamo u toj pripizdini".

Ako spadaš u 1% onih koji planiraju ići, ali negdje u budućnosti, onda se opet isplati sudjelovati u kampanji jer čitat ćeš putopisne opaske pa ćeš na temelju njih bolje isplanirati svoj vlastiti put i imat ćeš kvalitetnu fotku da te podsjeća na nešto gdje si i sam bio, tj bit ćeš jednom kada i ako odeš tamo.

Što se dobije zauzvrat, šta ima od perkova?

Ovo je jednostavna kampanja i nema puno perkova.

16 doloresa – Fotopis

Za 16 dolara (popust u odnosu na Pamir preklani) dobiješ putopis, sve postove i fotke koje ću stavljati kao pripremu i sa samog putovanja. Računam dosta pisati i u pripremnoj fazi, tema je zaista zanimljiva i ima materijala. Naravno, i sa samog lica mjesta ću stavljati fotke, putopisne crtice i slično. S prošle dvije ekspedicije (Pamir i Mustang) bilo je na svakoj po ukupno preko 200 fotki i 110.000 znakova teksta – dakle teksta za omanji roman!

Ovo s putopisom mislim riješiti vrlo jednostavno. Tko uplati 16 dolara, jednostavno ću ga dodati u posebnu zatvorenu grupu na Facebooku za ovaj projekt, i postove za one koji su pomogli kampanju učiniti vidljivima grupi "pomagača" da ih oni gledaju i da im osvježe dan, a drugi ne vide. Putopis i fotke neće biti Public!

Nije neka sigurnost s pet ključeva PGP-a, OIB-om i identifikacijom mrežnice, nego jednostavno, fleksibilno i za korisnika potpuno bezbolno. Kad uplatiš 16 dolara za putopis na Fejsu, više NE TREBAŠ URADITI NIŠTA, samo budi na Fejsu, imam tvoje ime i ideš na distro listu za odgovarajuće Fejs postove vezane s putopisom i to je to. Ne može lakše.

Sjedit ćeš sredinom kolovoza na Jadranu i dignuti Fejs "ajd baš da vidim šta ima" a tamo – neka budala gladan i smrznut u nekim vrletima. LOL! I još mora fotkati jer je obećao u kampanji. Nasmiješ se idiotu i nastaviš pržiti na suncu, pijuć koktel i gledajuć komade.

Ovaj model isti je kao za lanjsku ekspediciju na Mustang i preklanjsku na Pamir i funkcionirao je odlično.

50 doloresa – Fotopis F+

Isto kao fotopis, samo za one koji mogu i žele pomoći malo više! Prvi put sam u ovom rangu nudio Fotopis + pivo, ali onda se desilo sljedeće – nakon povratka kad sam ponudio ljudima da se nađemo i "odradimo" dogovoreno pivo koje im pripada, svi su u nekoj gužvi, ovo, ono, a ja sam zapravo sve s terena ispričao, i fotke stavio, već u putopisu. Tako da je to s pivom ispalo malo promašeno.

U svakom slučaju – budući da je 16 dolara zbilja sitna lova, tko želi pomoći s 50 – samo naprijed, cijenim to, ekspedicija ima velike troškove.... a što se piva tiče, lako se dogovorimo.

199 doloresa – Big Picture

Lovatori i oni koji vole umjetnost – ne znam kako će se pogledati u ogledalo ako ne uzmu ovaj jaki perk od 199 dolara... uspješni startupi, njihovi pokretači, investitori, vlasnici iPhonea, kapitalisti, neoliberali, paleoanarhisti, ljubitelji Tesli, mrzitelji Tesli, poduzetnici, saborski zastupnici, socijalisti, kriminalci.... a svih njih ima među mojim frendovima.... KGB ZNA da ovo čitate.... hehe....

U sklopu tog perka dobije se divna slika za staviti na zid – poput ovih koje vidite na fotografijama iznad i ispod ovog pasusa.

Slike s fotografija dio su mog projekta Without People – nisu s Pamira niti iz Mustanga, već samo ilustracija kako slika ovog formata, koja je dio perka, izgleda. Ovo doli je surovi neoliberal Nikša i njegova slika za Without People u gepeku.

Kliknite gore na tab Gallery, tamo je par primjera mojih fotografija, koje NISU iz Bolivije i Paragvaja – logično, jer tamo tek trebam otići – ali koje vam daju neku ideju kakav krajolik očekujem i kakav tip fotografija planiram napraviti. Ovo su inače moje fotografije iz Pamira, Armenije, Nepala, Kazahstana, Tajlanda, Irske, Turske, Kalifornije i Nevade (SAD), s lokacija donekle sličnih onima kakve očekujem, samo da vam da neku ideju.

Zapravo je interesantno kako su fizionomije ljudi iz Nepala i s Pamira slične onima koje očekujem na nekim mjestima i u Južnoj Americi! Mogle bi proći kao autentične...

449 doloresa – Neoliberal Bastard

Ovo je corporate package – imaš firmu, aute, robote, virtualne điđe, datacentre, softvere, ekstraprofite, saprofite? ...aj ne škrtari, pokaži da si baja! S ovim perkom ću na lokaciju uzeti i vaše predmete, majice, proizvode, i napraviti par reklamnih slika na licu mjesta, podijeliti domorocima ili nešto slično. Paket uključuje naravno praćenje same kampanje (za koliko god ljudi unutar firme želite), sliku velikog formata za na zid i po želji reklamiranje proizvoda/kompanije na licu mjesta.

Ovo je legenda Puskar, u Mustangu na Himalaji, s majicom slovenskog web shopa enaA.com, glavnog sponzora lanjske kampanje. 

Ovo je profesor Tursunbay, u selu Aličur na Pamiru, s brendiranom busolom Marco Polo.

1199 doloresa – El Comandante!

Ovaj je perk dostupan samo jedan. Uključuje mogućnost imenovanja cijele ekspedicije po vašoj tvrtci, promo fotke s logićima firme uz put, zastave, majice, slikanje kraj Cheovog zadnjeg položaja u majici s korporativnim logom (e ako ovo nije fora...) plus sve u ovom prethodnom perku (slika za na zid, putopis itd).

*************************

Što s lovom ako ne odem?

Imam namjeru otići u ove zemlje kad-tad, dakle jedini realni problem koji se može dogoditi jest odgoda puta zbog nečega, nemam pojma čega. Ako se baš desi da iz bilo kojeg razloga – geopolitičkog, zdravstvenog... nikako ne mogu u Južnu Ameriku... onda mogu obećati da ću sredstva po vrlo sličnom planu iskoristiti za neki sličan projekt, možda čak i zanimljiviji. Myanmar (Burma), Jakutija, Osetija, Transnistria, neka izgubljena, ali zanimljiva rupetina u svakom slučaju...

Isto vrijedi i ako se ne ispuni financijski cilj. Ekspedicija po planu koji imam vrlo je skupa. Ako se ne skupi ciljani iznos – putopis će biti s neke druge, skromnije lokacije. U svakom slučaju – bit će zanimljivo....

English summary

Hi, this is a campaign to get funding for expedition to Bolivia and Paraguay, two poorest and most unfortunate countries of South America.

The project is in Croatian, because I plan to go there and write travelogue in Croatian language, for my Croat readers (and others who understand Croatian). I will also post high quality photos – in fact, photos are the main motivation to go there. So, since photos do not require any translation – if you like nice photos you can support the campaign too... thanks.

Jedna od najstarijih informatičkih udruga u HR, okuplja korisnike Oraclea. Ako ste u IT-u, znate što je Oracle, ako niste - ni ne uznemiravajte se previše.... neka baza podataka, na kojoj se vjerojatno čuva.... pa više manje sve što itko zna o vama, negdje, a i mnogo više od toga. HROUG okuplja korisnike Oraclea u Hrvatskoj, kako bi im pomogao u zajedničkim problemima, edukaciji, po potrebi zajedničkom nastupu prema samom Oracleu (kao svojevrsni sindikat LOL, samo en uposlenika nego korisnika), a HROUG konferencije i druženja imaju legendaran status na IT sceni.Drugi je Manpower Group, multinacionalna tvrtka sa sjedištem u Milwaukeeju, SAD. Gotovo 70 godina, ManpowerGroup tvrtkama diljem svijeta pruža sveobuhvatna rješenja na području zapošljavanja i razvoja ljudskih potencijala. Kao najveća i najinovativnija globalna tvrtka u svojoj industriji, ManpowerGroup s više od 30.000 zaposlenih u 3.000 ureda i 80 zemalja i teritorija, godišnje provodi 12 milijuna intervjua u potrazi za najboljim talentima. Zaposlenici s odgovarajućim vještinama i iskustvom su postali najoskudniji resurs. Nude sve usluge iz područja ljudskih resursa, od regrutacije i pred selekcije do testiranja i intervjua do skraćivanja vremena zapošljavanja i vaših troškova.Treći (abecedno) je Omnizon Networks, dosad poznat kao Redok. Rebranding u Omnizon Networks je bitan element sudjelovanja u ovom projektu, pa ga zato naglašavamo. Omnizon (ex Redok) je na sceni od svibnja 2009. godine, a pozicionirali su se kao informacijski posrednik u procesu razmjene elektroničkih dokumenata, izrade porezno priznatog elektroničkog računa (eRačun) i arhive elektroničkih dokumenata u B2B i B2G okruženju. Osnovni im je cilj osiguranje optimalne informatičke infrastrukture, procesa i procedura za razmjenu elektroničkih dokumenata kako bi svojim korisnicima pružili uslugu koja će njihovo poslovanje učiniti još konkurentnijim. Tko je sudjelovao i pratio, obogatio se fantastičnim fotkama i saznanjima i osjeća se, zacijelo, kao i ja nevjerojatno privilegiran.OK SKEPTICI JESAM LI VAS UVJERIO??!!Kad se ide?Plan je kolovoz 2017.Zašto biste trebali podržati ovu kampanju?Zato što ti osobno koji ovo čitaš nećeš nikad u životu otići tamo. Ne zanima te, ne da ti se, daleko je.... IPAK, imaš priliku sudjelovati u odlasku u zemlje nesreće – preko ove kampanje! Neka atom tebe ipak ide tamo, atom zvan dolar, kuna, dojčmarka. Gledat ćeš fotke, postove odande i pomisiliti "i djelić mene je sad tamo u toj pripizdini".Ako spadaš u 1% onih koji planiraju ići, ali negdje u budućnosti, onda se opet isplati sudjelovati u kampanji jer čitat ćeš putopisne opaske pa ćeš na temelju njih bolje isplanirati svoj vlastiti put i imat ćeš kvalitetnu fotku da te podsjeća na nešto gdje si i sam bio, tj bit ćeš jednom kada i ako odeš tamo.Što se dobije zauzvrat, šta ima od perkova?Ovo je jednostavna kampanja i nema puno perkova.16 doloresa – FotopisZa 16 dolara (popust u odnosu na Pamir preklani) dobiješ putopis, sve postove i fotke koje ću stavljati kao pripremu i sa samog putovanja. Računam dosta pisati i u pripremnoj fazi, tema je zaista zanimljiva i ima materijala. Naravno, i sa samog lica mjesta ću stavljati fotke, putopisne crtice i slično. S prošle dvije ekspedicije (Pamir i Mustang) bilo je na svakoj po ukupno preko 200 fotki i 110.000 znakova teksta – dakle teksta za omanji roman!Ovo s putopisom mislim riješiti vrlo jednostavno. Tko uplati 16 dolara, jednostavno ću ga dodati u posebnu zatvorenu grupu na Facebooku za ovaj projekt, i postove za one koji su pomogli kampanju učiniti vidljivima grupi "pomagača" da ih oni gledaju i da im osvježe dan, a drugi ne vide. Putopis i fotke neće biti Public!Nije neka sigurnost s pet ključeva PGP-a, OIB-om i identifikacijom mrežnice, nego jednostavno, fleksibilno i za korisnika potpuno bezbolno. Kad uplatiš 16 dolara za putopis na Fejsu, više NE TREBAŠ URADITI NIŠTA, samo budi na Fejsu, imam tvoje ime i ideš na distro listu za odgovarajuće Fejs postove vezane s putopisom i to je to. Ne može lakše.Sjedit ćeš sredinom kolovoza na Jadranu i dignuti Fejs "ajd baš da vidim šta ima" a tamo – neka budala gladan i smrznut u nekim vrletima. LOL! I još mora fotkati jer je obećao u kampanji. Nasmiješ se idiotu i nastaviš pržiti na suncu, pijuć koktel i gledajuć komade.Ovaj model isti je kao za lanjsku ekspediciju na Mustang i preklanjsku na Pamir i funkcionirao je odlično.50 doloresa – Fotopis F+Isto kao fotopis, samo za one koji mogu i žele pomoći malo više! Prvi put sam u ovom rangu nudio Fotopis + pivo, ali onda se desilo sljedeće – nakon povratka kad sam ponudio ljudima da se nađemo i "odradimo" dogovoreno pivo koje im pripada, svi su u nekoj gužvi, ovo, ono, a ja sam zapravo sve s terena ispričao, i fotke stavio, već u putopisu. Tako da je to s pivom ispalo malo promašeno.U svakom slučaju – budući da je 16 dolara zbilja sitna lova, tko želi pomoći s 50 – samo naprijed, cijenim to, ekspedicija ima velike troškove.... a što se piva tiče, lako se dogovorimo.199 doloresa – Big PictureLovatori i oni koji vole umjetnost – ne znam kako će se pogledati u ogledalo ako ne uzmu ovaj jaki perk od 199 dolara... uspješni startupi, njihovi pokretači, investitori, vlasnici iPhonea, kapitalisti, neoliberali, paleoanarhisti, ljubitelji Tesli, mrzitelji Tesli, poduzetnici, saborski zastupnici, socijalisti, kriminalci.... a svih njih ima među mojim frendovima.... KGB ZNA da ovo čitate.... hehe....U sklopu tog perka dobije se divna slika za staviti na zid – poput ovih koje vidite na fotografijama iznad i ispod ovog pasusa.Slike s fotografija dio su mog projekta Without People – nisu s Pamira niti iz Mustanga, već samo ilustracija kako slika ovog formata, koja je dio perka, izgleda. Ovo doli je surovi neoliberal Nikša i njegova slika za Without People u gepeku.Kliknite gore na tab Gallery, tamo je par primjera mojih fotografija, koje NISU iz Bolivije i Paragvaja – logično, jer tamo tek trebam otići – ali koje vam daju neku ideju kakav krajolik očekujem i kakav tip fotografija planiram napraviti. Ovo su inače moje fotografije iz Pamira, Armenije, Nepala, Kazahstana, Tajlanda, Irske, Turske, Kalifornije i Nevade (SAD), s lokacija donekle sličnih onima kakve očekujem, samo da vam da neku ideju.Zapravo je interesantno kako su fizionomije ljudi iz Nepala i s Pamira slične onima koje očekujem na nekim mjestima i u Južnoj Americi! Mogle bi proći kao autentične...449 doloresa – Neoliberal BastardOvo je corporate package – imaš firmu, aute, robote, virtualne điđe, datacentre, softvere, ekstraprofite, saprofite? ...aj ne škrtari, pokaži da si baja! S ovim perkom ću na lokaciju uzeti i vaše predmete, majice, proizvode, i napraviti par reklamnih slika na licu mjesta, podijeliti domorocima ili nešto slično. Paket uključuje naravno praćenje same kampanje (za koliko god ljudi unutar firme želite), sliku velikog formata za na zid i po želji reklamiranje proizvoda/kompanije na licu mjesta.Ovo je legenda Puskar, u Mustangu na Himalaji, s majicom slovenskog web shopa enaA.com, glavnog sponzora lanjske kampanje. Ovo je profesor Tursunbay, u selu Aličur na Pamiru, s brendiranom busolom Marco Polo.1199 doloresa – El Comandante!Ovaj je perk dostupan samo jedan. Uključuje mogućnost imenovanja cijele ekspedicije po vašoj tvrtci, promo fotke s logićima firme uz put, zastave, majice, slikanje kraj Cheovog zadnjeg položaja u majici s korporativnim logom (e ako ovo nije fora...) plus sve u ovom prethodnom perku (slika za na zid, putopis itd).*************************Što s lovom ako ne odem?Imam namjeru otići u ove zemlje kad-tad, dakle jedini realni problem koji se može dogoditi jest odgoda puta zbog nečega, nemam pojma čega. Ako se baš desi da iz bilo kojeg razloga – geopolitičkog, zdravstvenog... nikako ne mogu u Južnu Ameriku... onda mogu obećati da ću sredstva po vrlo sličnom planu iskoristiti za neki sličan projekt, možda čak i zanimljiviji. Myanmar (Burma), Jakutija, Osetija, Transnistria, neka izgubljena, ali zanimljiva rupetina u svakom slučaju...Isto vrijedi i ako se ne ispuni financijski cilj. Ekspedicija po planu koji imam vrlo je skupa. Ako se ne skupi ciljani iznos – putopis će biti s neke druge, skromnije lokacije. U svakom slučaju – bit će zanimljivo....English summaryHi, this is a campaign to get funding for expedition to Bolivia and Paraguay, two poorest and most unfortunate countries of South America.The project is in Croatian, because I plan to go there and write travelogue in Croatian language, for my Croat readers (and others who understand Croatian). I will also post high quality photos – in fact, photos are the main motivation to go there. So, since photos do not require any translation – if you like nice photos you can support the campaign too... thanks.Rijeka Pjanž - granica s AfganistanomGhar Gumpa, Mustang, HimalajaPereval Khargush, Tadžikistan

story:
♥ About the Novel ♥

♥ We Are the Weirdos ♥

In this work of experimental fiction and magic realism, Maranda Elizabeth writes a vulnerable tale of perpetually misunderstood and powerless teenagers in a small town. We Are the Weirdos is an exploration of trauma, gender, poverty, invalidation, and memory, as well as themes of trust, abandonment, confinement, and revenge. The characters encounter one another, as well as authority figures and ghosts, at home and through institutions: school, court cells, a detention centre, and a group home, dreaming of magic and escape.

Indigo is a 13-year old goth and teenage criminal with a history of antisocial tendencies, shoplifting, destructive impulses, cutting, and dysmorphia/dysphoria. When they start bleeding petals and flames along with their blood, they make connections between alienation, magic, and survival.

Grey is Indigo’s best friend, a shy trans girl with stolen Sharpies and heavy sketchbooks whose illustrations come to life and make spells come true.

Both are the only children of poor, depressed, single moms in a small, mostly-white town in Southern Ontario. In 1999, their favourite movie is The Craft, their favourite band is Marilyn Manson, and their favourite activity is spell-casting. When they find a book about witchcraft hidden among a series of letters written to and from their mothers, who claim not to know each other and refuse to speak – one is mostly-absent, the other is obsessed with a talk show hosted by a psychic and Saturday night episodes of Cops – they choose to communicate with ghosts, and each other, instead.

As the two are separated, and Indigo is charged with crimes they barely remember committing, each of them continue casting spells – or trying to – in dangerous and painful attempts to stay alive. Shuffled through the juvenile injustice system, Indigo encounters Sea, a clumsy and curious social worker who hates her job and feels complicit in the pain of teenagers, and Mint, a 16-year old Black girl with a stick-and-poke tattoo of moon phases on her wrist, rage of her own about isolation and incarceration, and a longer sentence for a non-violent crime.

Each of them wants to be believed, to be real, and to create their own form of justice.

♥ About the Author ♥

♥ Maranda Elizabeth ♥

I spent my babyhood years living in a haunted house in a rural area, where I developed psychic connections with my twin, and with the ghosts in our home. In early childhood, my mom, twin, & I moved to a small town on Ojibway/Chippewa and Anishinabek land, also known as Lindsay, Ontario. As a misfit goth teenager who grew up watching 18+ shows on Showcase TV with the volume turned low, I was told by grown-ups that when I escape my small town, I need to find a way to live on Queen West, where the weirdos are. And now I do! I do my writing and magic-making from my bachelorex apartment on the traditional territory of the Haudenosaunee and the Métis, also known as the city of Toronto (from the Haudenosaunee word Tkaronto), Ontario. I've lived here for four and a half years, and plan to stay until my building crumbles in on me.

I’m a capital-C Crazy writer, zinester, witch, identical twin, high school dropout, cane-user, recovering alcoholic with 6+ years sober, cripple-goth, and white non-binary amethyst-femme. My pronoun is they. I write about recovery with borderline personality disorder, complex-trauma, and fibromyalgia; writing, creativity, & friendship; politicizing recovery; magic & witchcraft & Tarot; self-care, support, & $upport; and surviving poverty. I’ve been writing zines for fifteen years. In 2012, I published an anthology, Telegram: A Collection of 27 Issues, and in 2013, I published my first novel, Ragdoll House. As well as We Are the Weirdos, I’m also working on a book of non-fiction, To Be True to My Own Weirdnesses. I also offer Tarot readings for misfits & outcasts, and I publish a fortnightly column on LittleRedTarot.com, See the Cripple Dance. You can read more of my work at marandaelizabeth.com, schoolformaps.etsy.com, and @MarandaDearest on Twitter.

While We Are the Weirdos is a work (and it’s taken many years of work!) of fiction, much of it is influenced by my own experiences with growing up in poverty, devastating and excruciating forms of body and gender dysmorphia and dysphoria (before I knew those words, or the differences between those words), emotional neglect and physical violence, bullying, and not-being-believed. Being arrested, charged, and incarcerated multiple times in my early-teens contributed to my later diagnoses of complex-(p)TSD, borderline personality disorder, and fibromyalgia, as well as chronic feelings of alienation and isolation. Working on this novel has been a necessary and illuminating process in my ongoing recovery, as well as a major project that has sustained me through the last few years of a chronic illness which left me housebound, hungry, and alone.

When I was thirteen, I started reading zines, and in my mid-teens, I started making my own. My twin and I made a few zines together before we started making them on our own. Telegram is a zine I’ve been making for fifteen years. Early issues told personal stories on coping with loneliness in a small town, living inside books, and seeking magical friendships. Eventually, I wrote about mental illnesses, psych wards, chronic pain, disability, social assistance, and witchcraft, and in later issues, I wrote more about politicizing these experiences and re-imagining my writing as not only personal, but as spiritual and political contributions to mad and crip communities and lineages. I’ve been maintaining and Etsy shop with zines, books, and Tarot readings for eleven years. You can support my work at schoolformaps.etsy.com!

Along with my zines, I've also written e a blog on themes of madness, accessibility, disability, friendship, creativity, and self-care for many years. I recently wrote, What is Art About Social Assistance?, and talked about (re-)conceptualizing my writing as a contribution to this form of art, as well as reciprocity, inaccessibility, and high school dropout feelings. The piece includes a link to my Wishlist, with notes on texts about disability and poverty being too fucking expensive.

Other examples of my work are:

♥ Beyond Borderline and The Protest Psychosis: Black & White Protest Diseases & Politicizing Madness (Part One of An Ongoing Series)

♥ Bruises Self-Heal: the Body in Retrograde

♥ Won't You Celebrate with Femme Cripples & Other Storybooks

♥ Further Notes on Reclaiming Borderline and Resisting the Sane Gaze

♥ Making Spaces Accessible & Scent-Free to Create Opportunities for Friendship, Connection, & Support

♥ How to Support the Writer &/Or Artist In Your Life

♥ Creativity & Jealousy

♥ Self-Care for Zinesters

♥ How to Be A Good Friend to Crazyfolk

I also wrote a three-part series on Exploring Trauma, Madness, Chronic Illness, and Disability with Tarot. In Part One, I wrote about the Five of Pentacles and Three of Swords, in Part Two, I wrote about the Two of Pentacles and Eight of Cups, and in Part Three, I wrote about the Nine of Wands and Three of Pentacles.

While this work is very much continuing, my boundaries are changing, and I prefer to focus on fiction right now. Last March, I published an excerpt of an unnamed novella I’m working on, a near-future imagining of queer and trans crips and mad folks taking up space in a city where gentrification is slowly being unspelled by crazy and disabled witches, which you can read here:  The Horizon Condos Experiment: excerpt from an untitled novella.

♥ About the Illustrator ♥

♥ Cee Lavery ♥

I'm a self-taught (still teaching, still learning) illustrator and artist raised on Treaty 6 territory, on the traditional land of Cree peoples as well as the homeland of the Métis Nation (also known as Saskatoon). A first-and-a-half generation immigrant settler, I grew up in a white middle class two-parent home surrounded by books, music, and access to myriad forms and modes of art - I share these privileges for the sake of transparency, and because I believe they inform my work, as well as my perception of, and collaboration with Maranda's words, which have a history much different than my own.

My experiences as a genderqueer transmasculine-ish scamp-menace-big-kid-adventurer, a childcare worker, and an amateur plant enthusiast are, I think, evident in my drawings - there is a curiosity and delight in detail, a flagrant disregard for rules, and a deep love of instinct, vulnerability, and play in the work I create.

Currently, I am writing + drawing a graphic memoir in addition to my usual graphic design + editorial illustration work for small businesses and web + print media. I do this from my home studio in Montréal, traditional and unceded territory of the Kanien’keha:ka (Mohawk). You can find examples of my work at CeeLavery.com. 

I am honoured and overjoyed to collaborate with one of my dearest and oldest friends on this beautiful, uncategorizable, rebellious, and magical book.

♥ About Our Friendship & Collaborations ♥

Cee Lavery and I have been friends for nearly a decade. We met in a line-up at Union Station waiting for a Go bus. Cee complimented my plastic barrettes, and we realized we were both on our way to the same place: the Hamilton Anarchist Zine Fair. We became fast friends and pen pals, and we’ve collaborated multiple times since then, including designing zine covers and comics. Most recently, they’ve illustrated multiple personal essays I’ve published with TheEstablishment.co, which you can read here:

How Magic Helps Me Live with Pain and Trauma

Dreaming New Meanings into Borderline Personality Disorder

Why I've Learned to Embrace JOMO: The Joy of Missing Out

How to Support Your Disabled Friends in Winter and Beyond

♥ PERKS ♥

$66 - Your name will be printed on a list of contributors inside the e-book & paperback versions of We Are the Weirdos, and you'll receive a copy of the e-book as well as two paperback copies of We Are the Weirdos - one for you & one for your local library - and a personalized postcard from Maranda Elizabeth.

$99 - Your name will be printed on a list of contributors inside the e-book & paperback versions of We Are the Weirdos, and you'll receive a copy of the e-book as well as two paperback copies of We Are the Weirdos - one for you & one for your local library - as well as a personalized postcard from Maranda Elizabeth, and a single-card Tarot reading from them, too! (Please read the description of Tarot readings & delivery methods at schoolformaps.etsy.com.)

$113 - Your name will be printed on a list of contributors inside the e-book & paperback versions of We Are the Weirdos, and you'll receive a copy of the e-book as well as two paperback copies of We Are the Weirdos - one for you & one for your local library - as well as a personalized postcard from Maranda Elizabeth, a custom illustration by Cee Lavery of you as your favourite Tarot card!

$166 - Your name will be printed on a list of contributors inside the e-book & paperback versions of We Are the Weirdos, and you'll receive a copy of the e-book as well as two paperback copies of We Are the Weirdos - one for you & one for your local library - as well as a personalized postcard from Maranda Elizabeth, a custom illustration by Cee Lavery of you as your favourite Tarot card, and a three-card Tarot reading from Maranda Elizabeth!   (Please read the description of Tarot readings & delivery methods at schoolformaps.etsy.com.)

♥ How to Support Us ♥

Whether or not you're able to contribute today, we hope you'll share our work and encourage your pals to get involved! Please share our campaign on your social media, and tell your friends about it. To read more of Maranda Elizabeth's work, including zines & books, check out schoolformaps.etsy.com, and consider supporting Maranda & Cee by offering donations to PayPal.me/MarandaElizabeth & PayPal.me/CeeLavery. Stay witchy!
