story:
Howdy,

Introductions. I’d like to first say thanks for clicking your way to this point. My name is Xxavier Edward Carter, I’m an artist, born in Dallas, Texas, 1986. I went to college at Stanford University. I’m currently in Lisbon, Portugal. I’m working on my second novel and growing my art practice. My artistic practice is rooted in text making itself present through printmaking, video art, painting, drawing, design, photography, audio works, and performance pieces. My work utilizes the entire of a space to exhibit the visual weight of the architecture, emotive resonance, historical context, and the constantly evolving narrative of the people.

So why are we here? You may be asking yourself.

I want to produce my second novel, WE’RE FROM AMERICA, as a serial novel. The concept is I’ll release it in several 100 or so page increments then sending the completed text in one clean package. WE’RE FROM AMERICA is the second book in a series that follows the daughters of the Ashby Family. Each book is told from a different POV. Here’s a synopsis.

WE’RE FROM AMERICA is the first hand account of the life of Boo Ashby, youngest daughter, International Rockstar, stage name, Charlye Monroe. A series of events takes Boo into the underworld where she meets the real Charlye Monroe, origins unknown. The pair are off on an adventure through America, all of it. What better place to put yourself back together than in the presence of your alter ego. This book contains graphic violence, gore, sex, and rock and roll.

I’m collecting funds for a professional editor. From experience, editing is the most difficult part of the writing process, just try writing a text message. It took three editions for BF Chronicles to reach its present state. I don’t want that same thing to happen for WE’RE FROM AMERICA and I think an editor is the best way to solve that problem. I am current 118 pages in and on part two of the story. Going back over the text is motivating but it takes a lot of time and kills the momentum. With this campaign I want to get things rolling full steam and have the ability to create unbound. Of course it’s not going to solve everything in the text but all those annoying little typos and syntax errors will be dealt with much faster this way. So, on to what you are getting out of this wonderful exchange.

$2 – Special Thanks

As appreciation for your donation of $2 you will receive a thank you email correspondence from me.

$5 – Extra Special Thanks

With a donation of $5 you will receive a postcard and a hand written message of thanks for your support along with personalized illustration.

$10 – Reading Material

For a donation of $10 you will receive ALL installments of the WE’RE FROM AMERICA serial novel in digital format and a hand written thank you letter with illustration.

$20 – Double Feature

A $20 donation will land you two texts. WE’RE FROM AMERICA is the second book in my novel series. You will receive the first book BF Chronicles along with all installments of the WE’RE FROM AMERICA serial novel in digital format, as well as a thank you letter and illustration.

$30 – Literary Threesome

In giving a donation of $30 you will receive three texts. Along with my BF Chronicles and WE’RE FROM AMERICA, you will receive my first book of poetry, The Knockouts. This book comes with digital animations and illustrations for your enjoyment. You will also receive a thank you letter from me and an illustration.

$50 – Dedication

With the highest level of giving, $50 you will receive all three texts, a hand written thank you letter with personalized illustration and you will be featured on the dedication page for all of your support of WE’RE FROM AMERICA.

Of course, money isn’t everything, and I would love your support either way. There are a few ways you can help with this.

Review

Recommend

Share

I’m always looking for reviews, synopsis, anything that someone can write about my work I like to read, it makes me smile. You can get a free copy of my first novel BF Chronicles on line through several EBook Libraries. I currently have around 2100 reads on one website but the only review I have is my own and that’s cheating. Please, read, share the book with your friends, Share this campaign with your friends on facebook, twitter, linkdin, google plus, instagram all that jazz. If you are an editor and think you have what it takes, make yourself known, I read all my emails that aren’t spam. If you know an editor you think will be a good fit, put us in contact. Right now I’m in Europe working on several projects. Here’s a quick run down of the gauntlet.

War Is My Love – Short Film - The story focuses on an African soldier formerly a member of the Roman Elite now in Morocco at the end of a great war ending in dissolution.

True Colors - Video Poetry Project - Every color in the rainbow has a story. As my travels take me over the globe, I am creating short video art pieces themed on a color for the location I am in. Each piece is paired with a poetry piece presented in voiceover to the video.

World Wide Free Media – Poetry Book - Second poetry book with collected media.

It’s going to be a process but I’m looking to get there by Valentine’s Day. Check out some of my previous work on the portfolio section of my website. So there’s my pitch. Hit it.

written thank you letter with personalized illustration and you will be
featured on the dedication page for all of your support of WE’RE FROM AMERICA.
Of
course, money isn’t everything, and I would love your support either way. There
are a few ways you can help with this.
Review
Recommend
Share
I’m
always looking for reviews, synopsis, anything that someone can write about my
work I like to read, it makes me smile. You can get a free copy of my first
novel BF Chronicles on line through several EBook Libraries. I currently have
around 2100 reads on one website but the only review I have is my own and
that’s cheating. Please, read, share the book with your friends, Share this
campaign with your friends on facebook, twitter, linkdin, google plus,
instagram all that jazz. If you are an editor and think you have what it takes,
make yourself known, I read all my emails that aren’t spam. If you know an
editor you think will be a good fit, put us in contact. Right now I’m in Europe
working on several projects. Here’s a quick run down of the gauntlet.
War Is My
Love – Short Film - The story focuses on an African
soldier formerly a member of the Roman Elite now in Morocco at the end of a great
war ending in dissolution.
True Colors -
Video Poetry Project - Every color in the rainbow has a story. As my travels
take me over the globe, I am creating short video art pieces themed on a color
for the location I am in. Each piece is paired with a poetry piece presented in
voiceover to the video.
World Wide
Free Media – Poetry Book - Second poetry book with collected media.
It’s
going to be a process but I’m looking to get there by Valentine’s Day. Check out some of my previous work on the portfolio section of my website. So
there’s my pitch. Hit it.

story:
Bürgerklage gegen CETA

Ich möchte das Freihandelsabkommen zwischen EU und Kanada "CETA" per Verfassungsbeschwerde stoppen. Dazu habe ich den renommierten Rechtsprofessor Dr. Andreas Fisahn aus Bielefeld engagiert. Jeder Bürger kann sich der Klage kostenlos anschließen. Dies sollte die größte Verfassungsbeschwerde in der Geschichte Deutschlands werden.


Verfassungsbeschwerde

Die Kosten für die Verfassungsbeschwerde belaufen sich mit den verschiedenen entstehenden Unkosten auf insgesamt auf 14.000 EUR. Diesen Betrag kann ich als Privatperson nicht alleine stemmen. Daher bitte ich um Ihre Unterstützung.


Die Folgen

CETA kann durch das Bundesverfassungsgericht verbindlich gestoppt werden. Nur so können wir die Demokratie und Recht der Bürger vor dem entfesselten Freihandel schützen.


Risiken & Herausforderungen

Es ist möglich, dass das Bundesverfassungsgericht unsere Verfassungsbeschwerde ablehnt, aber wir müssen es zumindest versuchen. 


Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Wer die Klage nicht mitfinanzieren kann, 

  • kann trotzdem mitklagen: www.change.org/CETA-vollmacht 
  • kann die Petition unterstützen: www.change.org/ceta-klage

story:
Some of us know how to feel rich with no money...

full with no food
gifted with no gifts.
Yes, affirm your Queendom, Beloved,
with the vigor you hope your kin will for themselves
and live in the Kingdom built of village.
Blessed be this woman named Jasmine 

whose pen has a story to tell,
whose narrative is hers and hers alone.
Blessed be the kaleidoscope of her vision,
how she learns and perceives like no other.


Holy be this moment in time when "yes" 

swelled in her heart so big she could only show up.
Holy be the support that encircles her
Holy be her
her broken
her trauma
her testimony
her writing
Yes, write a fucking book Jasmine,
Amen.
- Jasmine Schlafke "A Short Poem on Queendom, Crowned"

My name is Jasmine Schlafke, also known behind the mic as "Queen Jasmeen." I am a doula, diversity trainer, sexual education counselor, and Santa Cruz's Grand Slam Poetry Champion 3 years running (2011-2014). I am currently working on my first book project entitled "Crowned" a collection of my poetry that also features collaborations with the community of artists that surrounds me. 

The book is a testament to my own resilience and a practice of self-love and self-healing manifesting in the form of personal narrative. By donating and helping me realize my funding goals, you will help me create a book that uplifts the story of a Queer, Biracial, Single mother struggling with mental health issues, a story historically kept from visibility, a story we could all benefit from hearing, a story you can help bring into the world. 

Funding Goals & Incentives 

Currently my funding goal is $3,000 dollars, which will fund the first 500 copies of my book and also cover any additional expenses related to marketing and distribution. Anything above my initial goal of $3,000 will go to keeping the book in print for as long as possible. Should I fail to meet my goal whatever I raise will go towards printing as many copies of the book as my funds allow.

I am offering the following incentives to contributors:

(Workshops & Performances must be in the Santa Cruz County or Bay Area)

40 minute Poetry Set for your Event or Private Party (must supply own tech): $200

1 and 1/2 Hour Workshop: "Freeing the Voice" (up to 6 participants): $150

Hour Workshop: "Freeing the Voice" (one on one): $75

Half and Hour Consultation on Writers Block: $50

A Signed Copy of "Crowned" and Poem Not Featured in the Book Itself: $25

A Chapbook featuring 10 poems from Crowned: $10

A 4x5 print of the book cover by L7: $5

Risks & Challenges

Currently, one of the main challenges to my book is the computer set up I am working with, which includes an outdated laptop with a broken computer screen and a desktop monitor that needs to be plugged in at all times. I've endearingly dubbed this set-up the "Ghetto Rig." As someone with visual processing disorder it is a struggle to write a +100 page book on such a set up. Despite this I have a community supporting me in the formatting and design of the book and I believe this is only a small hurdle in the production of this project. 


How You Can Help

If you can't contribute any money, you can help outreach by sharing, blogging, and advocating for others to donate and share whenever possible.

story:
“The French have a phrase for it. The bastards have a phrase for everything and they are always right. To say goodbye is to die a little.”
  - Raymond Chandler, The Long Goodbye



Raymond Chandler to Get a Star

The paperwork and approval process have been completed.  The Chandler Estate has given us their blessing, and the Hollywood Chamber of Commerce has approved a star for him.

It’s about time that Chandler was honored.  His private detective, Philip Marlowe, remains one of the archetypes of the hard-boiled crime fiction genre and has  influenced generations of mystery writers. 

It could be argued that Chandler created the Hollywood mystique, and if it were not for him there may not have been a Hollywood Walk of Fame.  His novels are the engine behind what was to become "Hollywood Noir."  Chandler had an immense stylistic influence on American popular culture and, in particular, the Hollywood style of film noir.

His books have been turned into eighteen movies to date and three television series.  Chandler's screenplays were no less noteworthy. Double Indemnity and The Blue Dahlia were Oscar-nominated for Best Screenplay,  and the critically acclaimed Strangers on a Train remains his great collaboration with Hitchcock.

Be Part of the Process

Donate. Get the word out. Work with us to get a great novelist and screenwriter a star on the Walk of Fame.

Trivia Question:

How many "solely" novelists or screenwriters have a star on the Walk of Fame?

Answer:  None.  All novelists and/or screenwriters on the Walk of Fame are also producers, directors, actors, or animators.

Let's make Raymond Chandler the first.  He deserves it.

How Funds Will Be Used

The major portion of the money ($30K) goes to the Hollywood Historic Trust and the physical creation of the star on the Walk of Fame.  The additional funds will be used as follows:


Perks/Rewards


Star Certificate - $25

This personalized certificate recognizes your participation in attaining a star on the famous Hollywood Walk of Fame for Raymond Chandler.  It includes a full-color mockup of the Chandler Star.

View larger image

Raymond Chandler Mystery Map - $50

In the style of '40s pulp detective magazines and books, the Raymond Chandler Mystery Map lists 96 different locations from Chandler’s mysteries.  The novels are listed chronologically, and each location is indexed according to the novel. Sites are identified with both fictional and real names, and a special symbol marks the spots where dead bodies are found in the books.  This perk also includes the Star Certificate.


Double Indemnity Screenplay - $100

Double Indemnity (1944) is a triumph. This collaboration between Billy Wilder and Raymond Chandler produced a masterful script with some of the most memorable dialogue ever spoken in a movie.  The film received seven Academy Award nominations and, more than fifty years later, critics agree that this classic is one of the best films of all time. This edition of Double Indemnity contains Wilder and Chandler's original and quite different ending.  This perk also includes the Star Certificate.


The Long Embrace (Autographed) - $250

Readers may have a hard time recognizing Raymond Chandler in the fragrant Romeo who pops up in The Long Embrace, Judith Freeman’s book about his 30-year marriage to Cecilia Chandler.

Here you will meet a man who listened to Mozart in the evening, wrote love poems, loved to waltz and believed in filling a woman’s room with champagne and roses.  He was a man enamored with a concert pianist’s beautiful wife who went by the name of Cissy.  This perk also includes the Star Certificate.




Library of America Set - $500

This two-volume set covers the full canon of Chandler's work, from early pulp stories to all the Marlowe novels, the screenplay for Double Indemnity, essays on the mystery genre, plus the usual Library of America goodies such as notes on the text, and a chronology of the author's life.

This perk also includes the Star Certificate.


Esotouric Tour for Two - $1000

The Raymond Chandler Esotouric Tour for Two takes you down the mean streets that shaped his fiction and that, in turn, shaped his hard-boiled times. This is a four-hour tour of downtown, Hollywood and surrounding environs: The Los Angeles Athletic Club, the Larry Edmund's Bookshop, the Hotel Van Nuys, Paramount Studio’s gates, and much more.

This perk also includes the Star Certificate and the Double Indemnity screenplay.


Walk of Fame Ceremony & Reception - $2500

You and a guest will be among the 60 special guests attending the exclusive Raymond Chandler Star Awards Ceremony on Hollywood Blvd.  You will also be invited to the reception afterwards at Musso & Frank.  Note that this does not cover travel or accommodations.

This perk also includes the Star Certificate, Double Indemnity screenplay, and the Library of America Set.

story:
Dear Friends and Family,

I am stoked! I am almost complete with the first draft of my new novel! After two years of scribbling madly in composition journals, over-caffeinated wild tapping on the keys of my laptop, and dictating notes and dialogue on a voice dictation app while driving, the end is in sight. It is currently over 500 pages!

The story is a post-apocalyptic epic quest, driven by a genderqueer protagonist. It is about finding home and finding oneself.

I really love this story and I know you will too. It’s a bit Mists of Avalon, a bit Red Tent, a bit Wraeththu, and something else altogether. I can’t wait to share it with you.

The next phase, after completing the draft, is revision. I have reached out to a mentor of mine, Josh Mohr, who offers editorial services under his business Decant Editorial. To see my manuscript be the best it can be before it reaches the desks of publishers and literary agents, working with a skilled editor is imperative. Unfortunately these services are not cheap! The charges for 8 – 10 weeks of one-on-one editorial assistance is $2700 - $3400.

I am asking my community for help. If you feel inclined, please contribute what you can so that this work can be its very best and to help propel me toward having my dream come true of getting published. I know this work is worthy of publication and I want to give myself, and the world, this gift.

I so much appreciate any generous amount you offer, and all the ways you have helped and supported me in my life.

Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

Advised by several literary agents and editors that her manuscript was compelling and rife with commercial potential but needed the skills of a professional co-writer to make it publishable, Shirley Turner contacted the English Department at the University of Maine. Her request for help included some of the details in this memoir, and perhaps because I have long taught Richard Hoffman’s Half the House, I was drawn to her story. Over the course of two years, three women took up and then abandoned the cause due to the intensity of Shirley’s manuscript, before I met Tina Passman, the Angel who shepherded this book into its present narrative form. She tinkered with little but syntax, grammar, and punctuation, with an eye to eliminating repeated information. By faithfully preserving Shirley’s voice, Tina allows this story to unfold as if the reader were hearing it over coffee at Shirley and Paul’s house on a snowy Maine afternoon. Nothing has been held back, but neither has anything been accentuated for effect. This is the straightforward telling of as difficult a story as I have ever heard. In the end, this is a journey of triumph, a story that exalts the incredible courage of one human being who refused to buckle under a barrage of despair, hatred, and trauma, inspired by the one pure love of her life. A story that needs to be heard.

What We Need & What You Get 

  • We need $3000 to get the book published and distributed. This will cover all the print set up, editing, cover costs, as well as place the book with a highly regarded press and distribution service.
  • Each contributor of at least $20 will receive a copy of the finished book.
  • If we  don't reach our entire goal, I have pledged to make up the difference myself. This is how much I believe this story must be told.
  • Having said that, we truly need the support of everyone to make this project a reality. And please remember that ALL proceeds go to Shirley and that neither Tina nor I have any financial interest in this book.

The Impact

The Destroying Angel  is unique and without artifice, driven by Shirley's original voice. In a world often swamped with anger and hatred, this memoir proves how courage and love can face down evil. 

This is not an as told to book, but rather a distinctly human memoir. Its publication will be a testament to the Shirley's perseverance and a revelation to all who read it

In my position as editor of the acclaimed annual anthology American Fiction, I read over 600 short stories each year, many inventive and inspiring, but this true story moved me more than  any fiction I have read in years.

Risks & Challenges

We need these funds to complete this project. Shirley and Paul live day to day in rural northern Maine in the most precarious of financial circumstances. This is why she cannot do this by herself, and though my wife and I will help, we cannot fully fund this either.

Once the goal is reached and we can be sure the book will be published, we'll be looking to set up media interviews and appearances to help promote this to a wider audience. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't at this time contribute, you can help. Please share this link with everyone you can via social media like Facebook and Twitter, and ask those you share it with to share it with their contacts and followers as well.

story:
A few years ago I met with a friend named Russel. When I talked with him, I asked him for advice on how to publish my first book, "Why Christians are Skeptical of the Supernatural." Russel stopped me, then said, "Do you just want to write a book or do you want to change the world?" Since I published that book in 2014, my friend's direct question changed everything for me from that point on.


My second and upcoming book, "Rescued Love" is mostly a personal biography of my life about my past struggles with rejection and personal identity. I've also included a chapter with a personal marriage testimony from two good friends of mine who give us a great example of what it looks like to never give up on love. Years ago, I struggled so much with rejection that I almost took my own life. It's been said that "What doesn't kill you makes you stronger," and I know that's why I'm alive today. I'm alive because the strength Jesus gave me through my pain is the same strength that'll help others gain victory through their pain. One of the main reasons I wrote this book is to use it as a form of suicide awareness. 


Over the past few years, God has put a passion in my heart to help those who are struggling with personal identity to discover their identity in Christ. The day I almost committed suicide, I saw pictures in my head of people being beaten and abused for their faith in developing countries. When I saw that, I knew I didn't want to take my life while others were being martryred for theirs.

We were all created for a purpose, but I believe the first step to making a difference in the world is for us to learn how to develop healthy thriving relationships with one another. I believe that in order for us to build a legacy for others to follow, it's extremely vital that we develop depth, vulnerability, and healthy communication in our relationships with people. If you believe you're called to make a difference, this book is for you.


***


On June 20th, I was accepted to the Harvest School of Missions in Pemba, Mozambique in East Africa. This school is led by Rolland and Heidi Baker. They are both amazing evangelists who demonstrate Gods love to those that need it the most. The school is from October 7th through December 6th.

Toward the end of my time in the school, there will be opportunities presented to me to do international humanitarian work full time. I have already sold, given away, and thrown away most of my possessions in preparation for this, and I will be getting rid of everything else I own before leaving the country to attend the Harvest School.


There are two particular war stricken countries that I know I'm supposed to go to partner with other people and help those who are being persecuted. story:
All about Jo:

Hi, I'm Josephine Myles and I live in Somerset, England with my partner and two children--a toddler and an 11 year-old with special needs. I've been publishing male/male erotic romance for the past seven years--mostly with Samhain Publishing. Unfortunately Samhain found it difficult to make ends meet in the current publishing climate and closed for business at the end of February 2017. I now find myself in the position of needing to get my Samhain backlist of nine titles (eight novels and one novella) back onto the virtual bookshelves as soon as possible. And to do that, I'm going to need a helping hand. But don't worry--I'll be rewarding all contributors handsomely with the books they've helped to republish! 

The nitty gritty:

I'm going to need to raise approximately $800 to buy back the cover art for my ebooks, as well as commissioning new covers for a few that need a facelift. Books need covers, I think you'll agree! But you won't have to judge these purely by their covers, because as a contributor you'll get some (or all!) of these ebooks for yourself. I aim to send out each individual title as "perks" as soon as they are ready, which will be at least a couple of days before they're back on the virtual bookshelves. The delivery date on the perks shows November 2017 because that's the absolute last date I'll get the final book out to contributors, but I'll be aiming to fulfil all the perks long before then.

Rest assured you'll also be getting a really good deal, as the retail price of all nine ebooks together will be $28.91--that's a total saving of $19.91!

Risks & Challenges

I've self-published quite a few books in the past (four novellas, 8 short stories and 9 anthologies) so I'm well aware of the amount of work involved. However, I'm also well aware of how little spare time I have these days what with looking after a toddler full-time, and how the trials and tribulations of family life can easily scupper my plans for work. That's why I've set a realistic re-release schedule, aiming to get one book out a month for the next nine months. This is the provisional schedule for the ebooks (paperback editions will hopefully stick to the same schedule, but might take a few weeks longer):

March: How to Train Your Dom in Five Easy Steps

April: Screwing the System

May: The Hot Floor

June: Junk

July: Stuff

August: Scrap

September: Handle with Care

October: Barging In

November: Merry Gentlemen

Now, in an ideal world I'd like to get the whole backlist republished as soon as possible, but I wanted to allow myself plenty of extra time so I don't get stressed, ill, and make my family unhappy. If things go swimmingly and I can get the books done sooner then I will (which means you'll get your perks sooner!), but I'd rather build that extra time in from the start so as not to put too much pressure on me. A small amount of pressure is motivating, but too much soon becomes a major stressor. And would get in the way of me writing new material, which I'm sure you're all keen for too!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't possibly contribute financially but would still like to help out, there are plenty of things you could do. Why not post a link to the campaign on social media? Or you could leave a review of one of my books on Amazon or Goodreads. Any raised awareness of my books will help me out, and I'll be ever so grateful :D

Cheers, me dears!

Much love,

Jo xxx

In the old days of baseball, real men ran the bases. Plying the game with hair adorning their faces. But the greatest in baseball if you didn't know, was the majestic mustache of Monte Monroe.

The book is fully written and illustrated. It will be published. There is no risk

story:
My name is Rebecca Waller, and I am a high school English teacher in Washington State. I have been writing on and off for the past several years - mostly short stories, essays, and poetry because that's what time and self-guilt have allowed me - but this summer I began writing a novel and am now deep into the process. Up until now, I have had trouble finding the time to write, mostly because as a wife and mother, I felt selfish asking for it. I have a career as a teacher and I have a family. This past summer, I set aside time each day during which my husband watched our two children so that I could write. And I have been. I am so thankful for that.


The story takes place on a fictional island in the San Juans called Salmon Island, which will likely also be the title of the novel. While the island itself is fictional, it is loosely based on my many visits to Orcas Island, and it was my family's most recent vacation there last winter that sparked the idea for this story. I have much of the story written and fleshed out, the details scrawled in a notebook I keep with me always. But there are gaps, mostly because I do not live on the island on which this story is based. 

In writing this story, I want to be true to the culture and rhythm of life in the San Juans, so part of my research is going to require me spending a significant amount of time on Orcas Island. My writing plan - and my request for financial assistance from you all - will take me to Orcas Island for 10 days this winter, and another 2-4 weeks next summer. My family will join me for part of that time, but I will have time alone as well that will be dedicated to interviewing the residents of the island, visiting the high school and government offices and agencies, and of course, writing and revising.

It has long been a goal of mine to see a novel through to the end, but what I lacked were time and resources to do this. My husband has been incredibly supportive by giving me the time and space that I need for this project, so now I just need your help to secure the funds for these two extended stays on the island, as well as the funding necessary for the publishing details. 


The money that I am asking you for will be going partly toward accomodations while on Orcas Island. Additionally, I will need funding once it is finished and ready to shop around. Before I take it to agents or publishing companies, I will bring the completed manuscript to Hugo House in Seattle, which is an organization that supports writers. They offer several classes that can assist me in figuring out what my options are, how to find an agent, and how to pitch my novel to publishing companies. I will also use this funding to pay a professional to create the design and layout of the novel for me.


If you help me with this project, you will be part of helping the rich tradition of writing that has come out of the Pacific Northwest. I didn't want to set the novel in a place that was not true to me and true to my roots. I chose not to write a story set in Boston or London or Florence - all cities which I love, but they are not my home. I wanted to stay true to the Northwest because it's in my blood and it is my inspiration. We need more literature from this beautiful region of the country, and in helping me, you will help provide it.


If you can donate, I appreciate it more than words in a novel can express. However, I will try. If you contribute at least $50, I will include your name on my "Thank You" page at the beginning of the book. If you are not able to donate, please help me make this story of the Pacific Northwest a reality by spreading the word to people you know who might be able to donate - parents, teachers, friends - anyone that you think would be on board with a project like this.


Thank you so much for taking the time to read about this project!

story:
Press talking about THEIA...



We all love a tan.


That bronzed, shimmering, healthy glow that you slip into before a fabulous party, big event or in prep for that daunting first bikini wear of the season.  As we learn more about the dangers of sun tanning, fake tan has become the go-to for every girl.  

 

BUT, what about those times when your tan goes wrong?  You wake up looking like you’ve just been cast as an Oompa Loompa in Charlie & The Chocolate Factory. It starts with a look in the mirror.  First the shock hits you, then the realisation that the wedding, the party, the event starts in approximately two hours.

YOU NEED TO GET THIS TAN OFF!  

You may scrub and scrub, and scrub some more with anything in sight or one of the ‘tan removal’ products currently available.  And the result?  Fake-tan that hasn’t budged and red raw skin.  You then take matters into your own hands… an industrial level kitchen scrubber, a lemon juice bath or perhaps event resort to a bath of Ajax (true story!)

So, maybe it’s not that drastic every time.  Maybe you’ve just encountered a few annoying stains on your hands, feet or ankles.  Maybe after a week of a fabulous faux glow, your tan is now beginning to get patchy and honestly looks pretty shocking. 

We hear you.  For years we’ve been listening to complaints from fake tan enthusiasts, friends and models about their fake tan disasters and the marathon efforts they’ve gone through to remove it.  We’ve listened to women who have told us they’ve wasted hours scrubbing and damaging their skin.

What if tan removal was as simple as spritz & wipe off?  Imagine an express fake tan remover that works in just two minutes, no scrubbing required!  Well now it’s possible… 


Introducing THEIA 

In response to the demand, we worked with one of the world’s leading formulators to create THEIA, a 2-step, fuss-free tan removal system.  Starting with the Express Fake Tan Remover, you’ll watch unsightly tan wipe away in a matter of minutes.  No more embarrassing moments or painful hours between tans.  No more cancelling dates or bronzing over patches.  And definitely no longer a need for harsh scrubbing and aggressive chemicals. 

                 


THEIA goes a step further.  We follow the tan removal with the Liquid Micro Peel to eliminate any remaining dead skin cells and leave your body polished, feeling smoother than ever. 

We all love options.  THEIA works for everyone.  It can lighten a tan that you find too dark, remove a five day old tan residue, or cleanse, polish and buff your entire body whenever you feel it’s time to return back to your original skin. 

We are proud to say THEIA is completely safe – no nasties here!  It’s formulated with natural and non-harmful active ingredients and is packed with a sophisticated blend of botanicals such as Aloe, Camomile, Orange Oil, Argan Oil and Acai Berry. There are no parabens or sulfates, no harsh preservatives, no artificial colours and of course we don’t test on animals.  THEIA is also vegan friendly.


Put simply, THEIA is the perfect blend of science & nature.

But why THEIA? 

THEIA was inspired by the Greek goddess Theia, the mother of the sun and the goddess of light.   She spreads the message of beauty and freedom, which is synonymous with our brand and values.


“We want every woman to feel like a goddess!  THEIA will get your fake tan off and your goddess on.” 

How it works  

THEIA is an advanced patent pending, simple 2-step process.  Remove it!  Restore it!

THEIA is a sophisticated blend of non harmful active ingredients and pure botanical extracts.  This gentle, yet powerful combination works effectively with the amino acids on the top layer of the skin.  This dissolves the fake tan pigment, allowing it to be gently wiped away.

REMOVE IT with THEIA Express Tan Remover with Acai Berry and Waterlily Extract

RESTORE IT with THEIA Liquid Micro Peel with Argan Oil

“I've never seen a fake tan remover work so fast and so easily.  I also love the micro peel”.  Maddy Kane - Professional Model.

Step 1: REMOVE IT - A delicate, yet powerful formula that softens and strips your tan off in minutes. 

Spray THEIA  Express Tan Remover over any fake tan residue, wait two minutes, then wipe clean with THEIA removal cloth.

Step 2: RESTORE IT - A multi functional micro peel to remove any remaining tan residue, remove dead skin cells, restore pH levels and leave you with a boost of soothing, anti inflammatory botanicals.

Spray the Liquid Micro Peel onto skin and start small circular movements with your hand.  You will actually see the dead skin fall of right in front of your eyes.




Who are we?  

Meet the creators.  We are Brie, Michelle and Mamun; together we have over 40 years of experience in the beauty industry.  We wanted to take this knowledge and experience to create something amazing and something the beauty world really needs. We know there are a lot of products on the market, new ones arriving in stores every week, especially in tanning.  However THEIA is very unique, you can remove your tan completely or simply bring it down a shade. We have created a product that our friends and clients have been screaming for - a quality product that works and is affordable. 


What people are saying about THEIA

''I fake tan every week. I like to have a bit of colour. I feel confident until the tan starts breaking up and looking patchy. I spend hours scrubbing and trying to soften it in the bath. I've tried every product on the shelves. When I tried THEIA I was in disbelief! It was easy to wipe my skin clean and I absolutely loved the micro peel, my skin feels softer and very even all over. This will now be my go to. I feel less stressed about the thought of getting it off and prepping for a new tan.''  Portia Kelly. Influencer. 
''I have tried the THEIA kit five times now, it's a dream come true for me because I have spent years scrubbing and using harsh chemicals. Sometimes I just use it for my hands and others times I use it for my entire body.  I also feel really hydrated after the micro peel.  I'm a devotee for life!''  Jessica McDonald, Professional Photographer.
''I am a professional model. I have to tan sometimes twice a week. We are expected to be tanned sometimes one day and have completely natural skin a day or two later.  This has been completely impossible until now.  THEIA removes my fresh tan even when it's not breaking up.  This is a life saver for people in my industry! I will never travel without a kit on hand.''  Madeleine Kane, Professional Model.

Our Funding Goal. We have self funded the development and formulation of THEIA since conception in 2013.  After two years of research and development we began international testing trials and small manufacturing runs.  We are now ready to take THEIA to the world and to do this we need $120,000 USD.  This collective investment will fund our bulk manufacturing costs and global distribution.  



What is included in the THEIA kit? 


1 x THEIA Express Tan Remover with Acai Berry and Waterlily Extract

1 x THEIA Liquid Micro Peel with Argan Oil

I x THEIA Removal Cloth

1 x THEIA Waterproof Travel Bag

Nb: Up to three full-body treatments per pack.

Other ways you can help. Please share our video on social media and help THEIA shine brightly in the tanning world.  We appreciate everyone who has joined the movement and and look forward to sharing this journey with our founding members and stockists.


Frequently asked questions.

Does it include nasty chemicals? 

No. This product is safe for all skin types and sensitive skin. Most of the ingredients are derived from natural sources. The formula is a sophisticated blend of natural and non-harmful active ingredients.  

Will it dry out my skin? 

No. THEIA is packed full of soothing botanical extracts such as Acai Berry, Water Lily extracts and Argan Oil.  Your skin will be left, soft, supple and smooth. 

Is it easy to use? 

Yes. We have made this as simple and easy as possible with clear instructions in our video and also on the packaging.

How does the remover work? 

Skin is comprised of three primary regions, the outer epidermis and middle dermis and the lowest area, the hypodermic.  THEIA Tan Remover penetrates the skin area between the top layer (stratum corneum) and the bottom layer (stratum basale).

THEIA effectively softens the active fake tan ingredients and removes the tan from the skin.  During penetration, the body does not absorb the product and it cannot affect the body systems.

What is a Liquid Micro Peel and how does it work?

It is a non-irritating, micro-bead free, liquid exfoliator which gently and effectively removes dead skin cells and impurities from the surface of the skin, dramatically improving skin texture and tone.  

How long will it take to remove my tan using THEIA?

Depending on the use, skin type and fake tan variety, users experience an average removal time of approximately 8 to 10 minutes for full body. 

How many removal applications do I get from the bottles? 

THEIA has been formulated for many removal purposes.  Some people may purchase it just for use on problem areas such as palms and feet.  Some may use it for the entire body.  Others may use it as a lightener if they find their spray tan to be too dark.  From our testing, the 100ml bottle removes up to three full bodies.

How hard will I have to scrub?

You will only need to use light, circular motions.  Some areas may require an extra spritz on stubborn stains.

Will it remove my natural tan? 

Not at all.  THEIA will only remove fake tan from your skin.

Can I get another tan straight away?

Yes, THEIA Tan Remover & THEIA Liquid Micro Peel will prepare your skin for the next spray tan.

Does it have artificial fragrance?

No, both THEIA products do not contain artificial fragrance.  You will notice a light, natural fragrance from the botanical extracts of Acai Berry, Water Lily and Argan Oil.

Does it take off spray tan and at-home bottle tan?

Yes. THEIA will remove both.

Can I use it more than once a week?

Yes, twice a week is perfectly fine if needed.

What are the shipping costs to buy THEIA?

We have free shipping within Australian.  For International orders you will need to select the International Goddess Perk of $12.  Our shipping price does not include any extra fees that customs may charge, or additional costs that may be associated with your country.   

What are the wholesale kit shipping costs?

Within Australia we have a flat delivery charge of $12 USD.  For International wholesale orders you will need to view the relevant wholesale order perk.  You will be contacted to pay the shipping charges prior to shipment, with the remaining 50% payment of your wholesale order.  Our shipping price does not include any extra fees that customs may charge, or additional costs that may be associated with your country.  

Where do I buy THEIA?

Right here, right now on Indiegogo is the ONLY place to buy.  Eventually THEIA will be in stores worldwide.  To get yours first, click on the Perk.  


The future is now. A streak-free, stain-free, flawless tan awaits… 

THEIA gives you the confidence to release your inner goddess.

OWN IT!  NATURAL BEAUTY OR A GODDESS GLOW. YOU DECIDE.
story_txt:
Press talking about THEIA...






We all love a tan.


That bronzed, shimmering, healthy glow that you slip into before a fabulous party, big event or in prep for that daunting first bikini wear of the season.  As we learn more about the dangers of sun tanning, fake tan has become the go-to for every girl.   BUT, what about those times when your tan goes wrong?  You wake up looking like you’ve just been cast as an Oompa Loompa in Charlie & The Chocolate Factory. It starts with a look in the mirror.  First the shock hits you, then the realisation that the wedding, the party, the event starts in approximately two hours.YOU NEED TO GET THIS TAN OFF!  
You may scrub and scrub, and scrub some more with anything in sight or one of the ‘tan removal’ products currently available.  And the result?  Fake-tan that hasn’t budged and red raw skin.  You then take matters into your own hands… an industrial level kitchen scrubber, a lemon juice bath or perhaps event resort to a bath of Ajax (true story!)So, maybe it’s not that drastic every time.  Maybe you’ve just encountered a few annoying stains on your hands, feet or ankles.  Maybe after a week of a fabulous faux glow, your tan is now beginning to get patchy and honestly looks pretty shocking. We hear you.  For years we’ve been listening to complaints from fake tan enthusiasts, friends and models about their fake tan disasters and the marathon efforts they’ve gone through to remove it.  We’ve listened to women who have told us they’ve wasted hours scrubbing and damaging their skin.What if tan removal was as simple as spritz & wipe off?  Imagine an express fake tan remover that works in just two minutes, no scrubbing required!  Well now it’s possible… Introducing THEIA In response to the demand, we worked with one of the world’s leading formulators to create THEIA, a 2-step, fuss-free tan removal system.  Starting with the Express Fake Tan Remover, you’ll watch unsightly tan wipe away in a matter of minutes.  No more embarrassing moments or painful hours between tans.  No more cancelling dates or bronzing over patches.  And definitely no longer a need for harsh scrubbing and aggressive chemicals.                  THEIA goes a step further.  We follow the tan removal with the Liquid Micro Peel to eliminate any remaining dead skin cells and leave your body polished, feeling smoother than ever. We all love options.  THEIA works for everyone.  It can lighten a tan that you find too dark, remove a five day old tan residue, or cleanse, polish and buff your entire body whenever you feel it’s time to return back to your original skin. We are proud to say THEIA is completely safe – no nasties here!  It’s formulated with natural and non-harmful active ingredients and is packed with a sophisticated blend of botanicals such as Aloe, Camomile, Orange Oil, Argan Oil and Acai Berry. There are no parabens or sulfates, no harsh preservatives, no artificial colours and of course we don’t test on animals.  THEIA is also vegan friendly.


Put simply, THEIA is the perfect blend of science & nature.

But why THEIA? 
THEIA was inspired by the Greek goddess Theia, the mother of the sun and the goddess of light.   She spreads the message of beauty and freedom, which is synonymous with our brand and values.



“We want every woman to feel like a goddess!  THEIA will get your fake tan off and your goddess on.” 


How it works  
THEIA is an advanced patent pending, simple 2-step process.  Remove it!  Restore it!
THEIA is a sophisticated blend of non harmful active ingredients and pure botanical extracts.  This gentle, yet powerful combination works effectively with the amino acids on the top layer of the skin.  This dissolves the fake tan pigment, allowing it to be gently wiped away.
REMOVE IT with THEIA Express Tan Remover with Acai Berry and Waterlily Extract
RESTORE IT with THEIA Liquid Micro Peel with Argan Oil

“I've never seen a fake tan remover work so fast and so easily.  I also love the micro peel”.  Maddy Kane - Professional Model.



Step 1: REMOVE IT - A delicate, yet powerful formula that softens and strips your tan off in minutes. 
Spray THEIA  Express Tan Remover over any fake tan residue, wait two minutes, then wipe clean with THEIA removal cloth.


Step 2: RESTORE IT - A multi functional micro peel to remove any remaining tan residue, remove dead skin cells, restore pH levels and leave you with a boost of soothing, anti inflammatory botanicals.
Spray the Liquid Micro Peel onto skin and start small circular movements with your hand.  You will actually see the dead skin fall of right in front of your eyes.








Who are we?  
Meet the creators.  We are Brie, Michelle and Mamun; together we have over 40 years of experience in the beauty industry.  We wanted to take this knowledge and experience to create something amazing and something the beauty world really needs. We know there are a lot of products on the market, new ones arriving in stores every week, especially in tanning.  However THEIA is very unique, you can remove your tan completely or simply bring it down a shade. We have created a product that our friends and clients have been screaming for - a quality product that works and is affordable. 






What people are saying about THEIA

''I fake tan every week. I like to have a bit of colour. I feel confident until the tan starts breaking up and looking patchy. I spend hours scrubbing and trying to soften it in the bath. I've tried every product on the shelves. When I tried THEIA I was in disbelief! It was easy to wipe my skin clean and I absolutely loved the micro peel, my skin feels softer and very even all over. This will now be my go to. I feel less stressed about the thought of getting it off and prepping for a new tan.''  Portia Kelly. Influencer. 

''I have tried the THEIA kit five times now, it's a dream come true for me because I have spent years scrubbing and using harsh chemicals. Sometimes I just use it for my hands and others times I use it for my entire body.  I also feel really hydrated after the micro peel.  I'm a devotee for life!''  Jessica McDonald, Professional Photographer.

''I am a professional model. I have to tan sometimes twice a week. We are expected to be tanned sometimes one day and have completely natural skin a day or two later.  This has been completely impossible until now.  THEIA removes my fresh tan even when it's not breaking up.  This is a life saver for people in my industry! I will never travel without a kit on hand.''  Madeleine Kane, Professional Model.

Our Funding Goal. We have self funded the development and formulation of THEIA since conception in 2013.  After two years of research and development we began international testing trials and small manufacturing runs.  We are now ready to take THEIA to the world and to do this we need $120,000 USD.  This collective investment will fund our bulk manufacturing costs and global distribution.

story:
Creating History (Scroll down for Cymraeg)

In May we're looking to create history. As your Plaid candidate for the Assembly election I want you to know that I am ready  to fight for CHANGE in Cardiff central. Our Plaid policies will help boost our communities through improvements in health, education and our economy.  

I am frustrated with the lack of progress made in the previous 17 years of a Welsh Labour Government and believe that together we can create a better Cardiff Central and a better Wales.  Plaid Cymru; the change Wales needs.

Help Us Make a Difference

All money raised will be used to fund the Plaid Cymru Cardiff Central election campaign. Every donation will be gratefully received.

You will have a dedicated AM who will always work for all the people regardless of their background -  an AM who believes in a stronger Wales for all our people, who will campaign for a better Health, education system and NHS here in Wales.

The Impact

The impact of electing Plaid's first AM for Cardiff Central will be seismic. Your contribution will help shake the assembly to the core - it will help spread our vision of hope and of a prosperous Wales. With your help, it is our intention to strengthen Plaid Cymru's representation in the assembly.  

..... and finally

For donations over £500 we are legally obligated to record of the donor's name and address and also to confirm the donor is registered at their address and therefore on the U.K electoral register.  Please call our office on 02920 472272 or e-mail us at glyn.wise@hotmail.com before making a donation.

DONATE NOW

Creu Hanes

Yn Mai rydym am greu hanes.  Fel eich ymgeisydd Plaid Cymru ar gyfer etholiad y Cynulliad yn mis Mai rwyf am i chi wybod fy mod yn bwriadu i ymladd am NEWID yng Nghaerdydd Canol.  Bydd ein polisiau yn helpu i roi hwb i'n cymunedau trwy welliannau mewn iechyd, addysg a'n heconomi.

Rwyf wedi cael digon o'r diffyg cynnydd dan 17 mlynadd o Lafur yn rhedeg Llywodraeth Cymru ac yn credu y gallwn gyda'n gilydd greu Caerdydd Canol gwell a Chymru gwell.  Plaid Cymru: Y Newid sydd ei angen.

Helpwch Ni i Wneud Gwahaniaeth

Defnyddir yr holl arian a gesglir i ariannu ymgyrch seneddol Plaid Cymru, Caerdydd Canol.  Cewch Aelod Cynulliad (AC)  ymroddgar fydd yn sicr o weithio i bawb beth bynnag yw eu cefndir - AS sy’n credu mewn lles holl bobl ein gwlad.  Byddwn yn gwerthfawrogi yn fawr pob rhodd.

Yr Effaith Mawr

Fe fydd effaith ethol AC cyntaf Plaid Cymru yn Canol Caerdydd yn drawiadol,  gyda’ch cyfraniad chi yn gymorth i roi ysgytwad syfrdanol i'r cynulliad. Bydd yn help i ledu ein gweledigaeth a’n gobaith am Gymru ffyniannus.

........Yn Olaf

Am gyfraniadau dros £500 mae'n gwbl angenrheidiol i chi nodi eich enw a'ch cyfeiriad a chadarnhau eich bod wedi eich cofrestru i bleidleisio yn y DU. Ffoniwch ein swyddfa os gwelwch yn dda  02920 472272  neu e-bostio glyn.wise@hotmail.com cyn gwneud eich cyfraniad.

CYFRANWCH NAWR

story:
Je hebt een droom! Je wilt een eigen bedrijf creëren waarmee je honderden mensen kunt helpen, en nu leer je hoe!

En toen was ik ondernemer....

Een bijzonder verhaal met een heldin die haar eigen bedrijf startte. 

Met praktische stappen die je kunt zetten om van jouw onderneming een bedrijf te creëren dat een positieve impact heeft op de wereld. 


Hoe lang duurt het voordat je als ondernemer geld gaat verdienen met je bedrijf? Hoe lang duurt het voordat je een continue stroom van klanten hebt? 5, 10 of 15 jaar? 

Misschien, misschien ook niet. Er zijn tientallen ondernemers die jaren worstelen. Er zijn ook tientallen ondernemers die binnen een jaar een winstgevend bedrijf creëren. Wat is het verschil? 

Wat is het verschil tussen succes en ploeteren?

Kennis van het ondernemerschap. Helder en simpel. Want het ondernemerschap is een vak apart. Je kunt nog zoveel kennis hebben van je eigen vak, maar als je niets weet van het ondernemerschap ziet de toekomst van je bedrijf er niet rooskleurig uit. En ik kan je een geheim verklappen:

Ondernemen is niet lastig, als je weet wat je moet doen en waarom je dat moet doen.  

Van knetterende burn-out naar succesvolle onderneming

Dit boek volgt de heldin op de voet als zij na een knetterende burn-out een eigen bedrijf opzet als burn-outcoach. Ze volgt 4 opleidingen, leest tientallen boeken en wordt een ervaringsdeskundige op haar gebied. Ondanks haar duidelijke expertise  lukt het haar niet om haar bedrijf van de grond te krijgen, totdat ze een dapper besluit neemt: ze gaat een training volgen over het ondernemerschap. Dit is wat ze leert:

  • Hoe ze zich onderscheidt van haar concurrentenen waar ze haar klanten kan vinden.
  • Wat ze kan doen om een website te creëren die van bezoekers klanten maakt.
  • Hoe ze een succesvolle marketingcampagne kan creëren en een continue stroom van nieuwe klanten aantrekt.
  • Op welke manier ze het best haar diensten kan aanbieden en welke prijs ze kan vragen.
  • Waarom verkopen liefdevol is en hoe ze zichzelf kan presenteren.
  • Wat het verschil is tussen lifemanagement en timemanagement en hoe ze een leven kan creëren waar ze blij van wordt.

Ik heb jouw hulp nodig!

Ik ben met veel plezier dit boek aan het schrijven, zodat ik op een bijzondere manier mijn kennis over het ondernemerschap met iedereen kan delen.  

Als je mij helpt met deze crowdfundingscampagne word je mijn partner. Jouw bijdrage zorgt ervoor dat ik dit boek kan publiceren.

Als het doel van deze crowdfundingscampagne wordt bereikt, kan ik mijn boek uitgeven en krijg jij de perks die je hebt gekozen.

Bonussen en perks

Om het waardevol voor je te maken, heb ik gave bonussen gecreëerd voor elk niveau van contributie. 

De bonus die je niet wilt missen, is het 3-daagse live event ‘Dare to be extraordinary’. 

Dit 3-daagse live event verkoopt normaal voor €1350,- maar jij krijgt het als perk bij je contributie voor maar €250,- (meer dan 90% korting) waarbij je twee kaartjes krijgt voor het 3-daagse event + een online training die bij het event hoort!

Deze fantastische bonus wil je niet aan je neus voorbij laten gaan.

Maar je kunt ook andere bonussen kiezen. Al vanaf €5,- kun je mij steunen en ontvang je een webinar over de 6 stappen die nodig zijn om een succesvol bedrijf te creëren tot een compleet jaarprogramma waarin je leert hoe je een bedrijf kunt creëren waarmee je meer dan €100.000,- verdient en honderden mensen helpt. 

Tot slot

Ik ben begonnen met mijn bedrijf Create, omdat ik net als jij graag mensen wil helpen. Dit boek zorgt ervoor dat ik duizenden mensen kan bereiken en hun kan leren hoe zij net als ik hun droom waar kunnen maken. 

Ik ben je dankbaar dat jij mij helpt om dit voor elkaar te krijgen. 

Wil je liever met iDeal betalen? Mail dan de perk die je wilt sponsoren naar info@createacademy.nl!
story_txt:
Je hebt een droom! Je wilt een eigen
bedrijf creëren waarmee je honderden mensen kunt helpen, en nu leer je hoe!


En toen was ik ondernemer....
Een bijzonder verhaal met een heldin die haar eigen bedrijf startte. 

Met praktische stappen die je kunt zetten om van jouw onderneming een bedrijf te creëren dat een positieve impact heeft op de wereld. 


 
Hoe lang duurt het voordat je als
ondernemer geld gaat verdienen met je bedrijf? Hoe lang duurt het voordat je
een continue stroom van klanten hebt? 5, 10 of 15 jaar? 
Misschien, misschien ook niet. Er zijn
tientallen ondernemers die jaren worstelen. Er zijn ook tientallen ondernemers
die binnen een jaar een winstgevend bedrijf creëren. Wat is het verschil? 
Wat is het verschil tussen succes en
ploeteren?
Kennis
van het ondernemerschap. Helder en simpel. Want het ondernemerschap is een vak
apart. Je kunt nog zoveel kennis hebben van je eigen vak, maar als je niets
weet van het ondernemerschap ziet de toekomst van je bedrijf er niet
rooskleurig uit. En ik kan je een geheim verklappen:
Ondernemen is
niet lastig, als je weet wat je moet doen en waarom je dat moet doen.  

Van
knetterende burn-out naar succesvolle onderneming


Dit boek
volgt de heldin op de voet als zij na een knetterende burn-out een eigen
bedrijf opzet als burn-outcoach. Ze volgt 4 opleidingen, leest tientallen
boeken en wordt een ervaringsdeskundige op haar gebied. Ondanks haar duidelijke
expertise 
lukt het haar niet om haar bedrijf van de grond te krijgen, totdat ze
een dapper besluit neemt: ze gaat een training volgen over het ondernemerschap.
Dit is wat ze leert:




Hoe ze zich onderscheidt van haar concurrentenen
waar ze haar klanten kan vinden.


Wat ze kan doen om een website te
creëren die van bezoekers klanten maakt.


Hoe ze een succesvolle marketingcampagne kan
creëren en een continue stroom van nieuwe klanten aantrekt.


Op welke manier ze het best haar diensten kan
aanbieden en welke prijs ze kan vragen.

ze zichzelf kan presenteren.

timemanagement en hoe ze een leven kan creëren waar ze blij van wordt.

story:
Help fund another year of Pagan news and journalism at The Wild Hunt! Your support makes it happen!

The Wild Hunt's 2014 Fall Funding Drive

We are now in the 10th year of The Wild Hunt! What began in 2004 as an experiment run by an enthusiastic novice, has slowly morphed into one of the most widely-read news magazines within modern Paganism. I am still taken aback by the fact that thousands daily read not only my work, but the work of a growing number of reporters and columnists dedicated to a vision of journalism and accountability within our family of faiths. It has been a distinct honor and privilege to oversee this project, and I believe that good work has been done, work that has helped define who we are, and what we value. 

What has been instrumental in shepherding our transition from a small blog into a project with a editorial structure, staff, and a selection of columnists who challenge and enlighten us has been your fiscal support. This year's Fall Funding Drive will be vital to the future health and growth of The Wild Hunt. As you may know, I recently announced that I was transitioning away from the daily running of the site, and passing on the duties of Managing Editor to the capable shoulders of Heather Greene, who brings to the job deep experience working directly with a variety of Pagan organizations, and and impressive professional media background. Likewise, our two staff reporters, Cara Schulz and Terence P. Ward, also have backgrounds in professional journalism, and are moving The Wild Hunt closer and closer to an ideal of providing top-notch primary source journalism on a regular basis. 

Today is the beginning of a new Fall Funding Drive, and we're asking for a base budget of $12,500 dollars to run for another year, and we're hoping that you will help us not only meet this goal, but surpass it and allow us to do even more. The more we raise, the more we can do. Want to see more regular columnists? Want to see more staff writers? Then I would love to see us push well past that base goal in the coming month. I know that there are many thousands of readers out there, and I know it would only take a fraction donating to not only fund us, but help us greatly expanding the coming year. 

What We Need & What You Get

$12,500 dollars will allow us to pay our hosting bills for another year, pay our staff, and cover other expense related to running the website. In addition, thanks to fiscal oversight from The Pantheon Foundation, all your donations will be tax deductible.

100% of our budget goes back into The Wild Hunt.  

The Impact

The Wild Hunt has a proven track record that stretches over nearly 10 years, and over those years we've become an essential news source and inspired many to create their own media. We've interviewed big-name Pagans like Margot Adler and Starhawk, reported on controversies and inspirational moments that have affected our community deeply, and acted as a watchdog when the mainstream media reports on modern Pagans and other minority faith traditions. However, the commitment, time, and energy needed to make this sustainable can only happen if you are willing to step forward and help us fund it. 

Over the years many have said our community has a hard time supporting institutions and services that benefit them. I don't believe that. I think we can come together if something is worthwhile, and goes to the trouble to ask. I believe The Wild Hunt is giving something unique to our community, and I am asking you, please help us expand and grow into an independent institution that can serve your daily news and information needs. Our success won't just be for us, it will be for you, and for those who follow us. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute now, you can still help! Just share this campaign on Facebook, on Twitter, on Tumblr, on your favorite Pagan email list, and let them know why this is important to you. The more people speak out, the better we can do!

story:
Since 2008 Joyland Magazine has brought you the best fiction from North America, in print and online, using our networked editorial outposts across the United States, Canada, and beyond.  This geographical diversity means there’s no single Joyland voice and we’ve been able to publish bestselling authors alongside uncompromising new talents including Jonathan Lethem, Amelia Gray, Lydia Millet, Roxane Gay, Peter Orner, Lynne Tillman, Emily St. John Mandel, Lynn Coady, Molly Antopol, and hundreds more.

It’s a conversation between writers and places that is unique among literary journals.

To keep the conversation going we are in need of a new site. With over 500 stories in our archive an up-to-date design will make Joyland a stable destination not only for readers, but for teachers and professors who rely on our open content.

Our web developer has already pledged generously discounted hours to the project and with your help we can cover the rest.The new site will: 

-Run much smoother on mobile platforms 

-Use less memory and look sharper 

-Generate a text archive of all works on the site. Maintaining an archive that will be readable for years is an incredibly important issue facing digital publishing. 

Any money raised after our goal is met will be put towards a paid internship program for 2015.

Check out our image gallery to look over the perks!

story:
Short Summary

John Tuschen was Madison, WI´s first poet Laureate. 

Tuschen had 3 core beliefs: 1) Art belongs to the people, 2) Art makes the daily grind possible, and 3) people both need and want Art to interact in their daily lives. From 2003 to 2005 he reached through the network of poets living in and around Madison to find one poem every two weeks to publish and distribute on the streets of Madison´s downtown, he called it the State Street Poetry Sheet.


What We Need & What You Get

10 years later, we (core team of Jordan T. Caylor and Suni L. Caylor) want to publish these poems in a paperback book that will once again be free on State Street, in libraries, high schools, neighborhood centers and the Madison Arts Commission, from whom we are applying for a project grant of $3000 which must be matched by out-side funding and in-kind donations. We want to see theses poems back on the streets.

Any books not distributed directly will be sold through the Madison Public Library Bookshop with the proceeds going to the John Tuschen Poets Laureate scholarship fund: 

https://www.madisoncommunityfoundation.org/SSLPage.aspx?pid=200&fid=VHcK8D7Hr8Q%3D&fdesc=Z4jZIAZ5uuJYQdQOO8T%2BJqskGXMPf7DPwgpg3neX7yGwX5%2BVPaI%2Fw1gRFrfLqdc%2F


The Impact

Your help is crucial to the award of the grant: no matching funds, no grant. If you feel as strongly as we do that poems are like the blood that keeps our bodies alert and alive then we urge you to make a donation to this project, to help us get good poems back in the hands of the people. We thank you for caring as much as we do that Art and Poetry live among us.

Risks & Challenges

Should the monies raised, including the grant, be insufficient to the task of publishing 300 books, we will continue to raise money until the overage is paid and the books are in the hands of all who have been named and a copy to each poet in the book.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know not everyone interested in seeing poetry in the public eye has money to contribute.  You can still help the movement:  please share our need and the indiegogo web site at poetry slams, in poetry groups that you attend and among your friends. Indiegogo has share tools, please look into them and use any that are appropriate to you.  With your help, this will be a rare case of poetry making money!  

Thank you all so much for your time and interest.


-----------------

A very special thanks to the unknown photographers who´s images made this video possible. Please write me here to be included in the credits. Image of State Street by Jefko Photography©

story:
The Author

Kaja Blackley is a Canadian writer and illustrator. He was named one of the 100 Canadians to Watch by Maclean’s Magazine. His work has been adapted for a Hollywood movie, and appears in a variety of print media.

 

The Facts

Maggie MacCormack and the Witches’ Wheel is finished and professionally edited. The illustrations are also complete. This magical 300-page young- adult novel is being pre-sold to help finance its initial print run.

It was written over a two-year period when Kaja – partially paralyzed, unable to work, and with only his two index fingers free to type with – became determined to write the story he intended to write since his first child was born.

Kaja was the first supporter of this Indiegogo campaign, investing $1000 of his own money when this campaign went live.

The Inspiration

Around the time Kaja’s wife, Christina, gave birth to their daughter there were lots of boys’ adventures that girls enjoyed, like the story of the boy wizard with Coke-bottle glasses who took the world by broomstick; but there wasn’t a girl’s adventure story, especially one featuring a strong girl in a world that brings out that strength, that resonated as universally.

Their daughter became the inspiration for Maggie MacCormack and the Witches’ Wheel.

The Story

Maggie is a ginger-haired, twelve-year-old orphan who has been passed from one foster family to the next all her life. She never knows where she’ll end up so she’s become suspicious and independent, scrappy and resourceful.

As the story begins, Maggie is placed yet again into foster care – this time into a much more welcoming family. But Maggie can't shake the feeling that something is a bit off about her new home. She slowly ends up having to toss everything she understood about herself and her life out the window. But by that time, things have gone awry – it’s too late for her to run from the approaching danger.

Maggie MacCormack and the Witches’ Wheel is often times quite charming, while at other times nail-bitingly grim. It is a love letter to imagination, gripping adventure and Earth’s environment.

 

Supporting Literacy

This author supports literacy through access.

3% of Maggie MacCormack and the Witches’ Wheel gross sales, in perpetuity, will be donated to: www.childrensbookbank.com

 

Giving Back to the Environment and Local Community

Maggie MacCormack, though heavy on the magic, is based on a daunting reality: introducing toxins into the environment compromises or destroys entire ecosystems. And for that, there are no magic remedies.

7.5 % of Maggie MacCormack and the Witches’ Wheel gross sales will be donated as explained below. (Kaja is not affiliated with the beneficiaries.)

2.5% of Maggie's gross sales will be donated, in perpetuity, to https://www.sealegacy.org;

2.5% of Maggie's gross sales will be donated, in perpetuity, to https://onetreeplanted.org;   

2.5% of Maggie's gross sales will be donated to https://barriefoodbank.org/

So:

Of each $18.00 softcover sold $1.35 goes to the non-profits named above.

Of each $36.00 hardcover edition sold $2.70 goes to the non-profits named above.

If we sell 2,500 softcover and 500 hardcover editions: $4,725 goes directly to the non-profits named above. If we sell 5,000 softcover and 1,000 hardcover $9,450 goes directly to the non-profits named above.

The more books sold, the more money is donated.

 

Why Kaja Publishes Through His Own Imprint

Many of Kaja Blackley’s other projects have been represented by major agencies. However, the time between selling a manuscript and seeing it on the bookshelves can be as long as three to four years. Acquisition editors are liable to overlook quality material –– J.K. Rowling’s Harry Potter and The Philosopher Stone was rejected; Frank Herbert’s Dune was rejected; CS Lewis’ The Chronicles of Narnia was rejected; Kenneth Grahame’s The Wind and The Willows was rejected; William Golding’s Lord of the Flies was rejected; Melville’s Moby Dick was rejected; Fitzgerald’s The Great Gatsby was rejected; Dr. Seuss was rejected; Agatha Christie was rejected; heck, Beatrix Potter’s Peter Rabbit was rejected so many times Potter published it herself. (Peter Rabbit has now sold over 150 million copies in 35 languages). Kaja would rather put his trust in his prospective readership.

Size and Format

Maggie MacCormack and the Witches’ Wheel will be printed in softcover and hardcover.

The dimensions are 5.5” x 8.26”.

The cover will be full colour, with spot varnish and foil stamping. The interior pages will be printed in two colours, and will include several two-colour illustrations.

A full-colour tip-in will be a feature in both editions.

The softcover edition will have three-inch cover flaps.

The hardcover edition will include a slip case and full-colour end papers.

 

Goals

The initial print run will be 2,500 softcover and 500 hardcover editions. Kaja has invested $1,000 of his own money into this campaign and is seeking to raise another CAD$9,500 , for a goal of CAD$10,500.

If $14,000 is raised the print run will increase to 5,000 softcover, 1,000 hardcover.

The print run will not be finalized until the end of this campaign.

The more books bought. The more we can give to the environment.

 

Stretch Goals

$14,000 will unlock a set of three bookmarks for the $56 contribution category and higher.

$20,000 will unlock a six-colour, 23 ½” x 15 ¾” poster for the $56 contribution category and higher.

$27,000 will unlock a T-shirt for for the $56 contribution category and higher.

$50,000 will unlock an audio book of Maggie for the $56 category and higher, and send our team to the Frankfurt book fair, October 2018 to premiere Maggie MacCormack and the Witches’ Wheel  internationally.

 

Production Cycle

10 business days for pre-production: proofing the proofs

10 business days for printing and binding

15 business days for shipping from printer in China

10 business days to process and ship orders

15-20 business days for delivery, depending on geographical location

Estimated delivery date: July 26, 2018.

 

Shipping Information

Every care is taken to ensure that you receive the items you order intact and within production cycle estimates. All items are shipped “Tracked Package” from Canada. Every backer will receive their own tracking number by email on the day their perk has shipped. We do not control the shipping charges. Prices are estimates provided by Canada Post in advance of this campaign.

 

Risks and Remedies

In over 30 years of publishing, printing, distributing and shipping, Kaja has on many occasions supervised printing and shipping from Asia. At the risk of sounding a bit Monty Python-like, the boat carrying your order could sink en route to our port of delivery…but it’s highly unlikely. It is possible that some individual orders may be lost in transit.

We will address each instance of loss in transit expeditiously and on a case-by-case basis. If we determine that a shipment has indeed been lost in transit, we will replace your order once, at no additional cost to you.

The honest truth is that Maggie MacCormack and the Witches’ Wheel is ready to print and -- notwithstanding the risks mentioned above -- we do not anticipate any obstacles preventing us from delivering your book as laid out in our production cycle estimates.

We will provide regular updates keeping our supporters informed throughout this venture.

Sincere and humble thanks for your support.

 

 

The Maggie MacCormack Campaign Team
